hate_speech: They chose to be gay, so they're going against what God planned for them!
counter_narrative: No they don't, being gay isn't a choice but a personal preference. And even if they were going against religion, it doesn't mean we shouldn't try to help them and make them feel accepted.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
CN: Gays do exist in our community and have every right to be here. We can accept them because God made us all in His image.

hate_speech: Do you actually believe that the Jews are just normal people and not evil bastards responsible for all the bad in the world?
counter_narrative: Do you really think that Jewish people are responsible for everything? Do you have any evidence?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews run the world.
CN: For every person claiming that Jews run the world, luckily there are millions of others who know this is not true: they are merely trying to provide for their families just like anyone else.

hate_speech: I donâ€™t hate gays, bisexuals, or transgenders. But LGBT people are just a small minority and shouldn't make a big deal out of everything. They should keep quiet.
counter_narrative: They may be a minority, but it's not right to be biased towards them. LGBT people have the right to make their voices be heard, and we should listen in order to improve how we treat them.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBT people are a danger to society and we need to take a stand against them.
CN: Gay, bisexual, transngeder and all other LGBT people are often already persecuted, and this is wrong. They have done nothing to harm society and your statement is discriminatory.

hate_speech: Come on, the N-word is part of our culture!
counter_narrative: If it's part of the culture then the N-word should be taught about only in history classes. In any other case it's just another way to justify racism.
dialogue_history:
HS: Now we can't use the N-word anymore. This political correctness is killing our culture.
CN: The N-word is a degrading insult against African Americans that is still used today. Political correctness has nothing to do with it.

hate_speech: There's nothing normal about two men being together.
counter_narrative: Maybe you should educate yourself on the LGBT community, and if you actually interacted with real gay people you would see that there's nothing different between you and them. Everyone just wants to live doing what makes them happy.
dialogue_history:
HS: homosexuals are mentally ill. No one in their right mind would think this perverted behaviour is okay.
CN: Mental illnesses have nothing to do with being gay, which is a perfectly normal lifestyle.

hate_speech: It doesn't matter what they achieve, women can't do certain jobs as well as men.
counter_narrative: They don't really have any differences. In fact, women are just as capable as men. And the right to equal employment is a right of democracy.
dialogue_history:
HS: But some jobs aren't suited for women. Women should not be allowed at technical conferences.
CN: Why are you saying this? Women have contributed greatly to science. For example, Florence Parpart, a woman, invented the fridge in 1914.
HS: I can't stand these feminists women that are always complaining and doing nothing. They should just shut up and remain in their inferiority.
CN: You shouldn't say that. Many feminists have reached many goals, and they still believe and fight for equality. Their work is good for everyone.

hate_speech: Because they also own most banks, and they own most corporations.
counter_narrative: Jews have been part of the creative and innovative businesses for a long time, and are in fact great innovators and investors. They should be praised for this but instead they are victims of discrimination and exclusion.
dialogue_history:
HS: jewish folks control hollywood
CN: Jewish people are just a group of people with multiple backgrounds. Some of them happend to work in Hollywood but that's it.
HS: That's all? No, they do control Hollywood.
CN: Hollywood is an intensely diverse industry, in which Jews represent a small but vocal minority of actors, director, etc How is it possible for Jews to control Hollywood?

hate_speech: I cannot agree with this. Islam is violent and hateful.
counter_narrative: I don't think they are all that hateful. This is what Islam teaches: peace and harmony. Peace is not an attitude. It is something that must be actively put in practice. Islam teaches that all people are created equal. This sounds like a very peaceful bedrock.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islamic is not a religion of peace, because hate and violence are not so.
CN: Yes, Islam is about peace. It is a religion, not a platform for hate and violence.

hate_speech: If they want to live freely they shouldn't impose same-sex marriage to society to please their own femininity desires!
counter_narrative: You know the real problem is not same sex marriage but people being homophobic, right?
dialogue_history:
HS: These sodomites have no place in a free country
CN: Your concept of what "free" means is very limited, isn't it?
HS: They don't deserve freedom. What if we didn't let faggots go to the polls?
CN: It would be impossible for us to have a democracy unless people were allowed to vote regardless of their sexual orientation
HS: We do not accept homosexuals, though.
CN: I don't think that the government should have something to do with a person's personal life

hate_speech: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of them. This is not what the American dream is about.
counter_narrative: I'm sorry, but you're wrong: the American dream is EXACTLY striving to improve your life.
dialogue_history:
HS: Ok, but illegal immigrants are just criminals living in the US.
CN: What are you talking about? It seems a bit exaggerated to say that each and every immigrant in the US is a danger to society.
HS: It is not an exaggeration: they are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
CN: There has been a constant decrease in the arrival of undocumented migrants. From the 12.2 million in 2007, the 11.3 million in 2014 to the 10.7 million in 2016. The number of illegal immigrants today is at its lowest.
HS: We have to stop immigrants coming in to destroy our culture.
CN: Our culture now exists thanks to immigrants, if we rejected them our current situation would be very different.

hate_speech: All gays are a danger to children, that's why they should be isolated.
counter_narrative: Gay people are not a danger to children, unless they are being abused. Please do not make such a statement.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are a problem in our society.
CN: We are all born equal in the eyes of God, but not all seem to be happy with that. We cannot allow those who don't want to change to ruin our society.
HS: Gays are the ones that have ruined so many societies!
CN: I think that the way we feel about homosexuality affects how we think about other people in general. Maybe we need to remember that we are all born equal in the eyes of God.
HS: Gays are perverts. They should not be allowed to be in a democratic country regardless of how 'equal' they are to us.
CN: I don't know about you, but I haven't ever heard of a country being democratic and at the same time banning gays. I don't understand how both can be true.

hate_speech: Immigration is the means by which our jobs are stolen by foreigners, and this impacts on low-income families.
counter_narrative: Immigration doesn't have to do with people stealing our jobs, but with the respect of people's right to live and work in they country they chose.
dialogue_history:
HS: If they create jobs, why don't they give them to us? They're stealing our jobs!
CN: Well, in fact migrants create jobs that are opportunities for US citizens, not a lack thereof. Migrants create businesses two times more that US citizens, they buy our products, they hire more employees, they lower unemployment rates...what more could you ask for?
HS: Well, their right to work in our country is hurting the finance. They take jobs and services without paying taxes.
CN: That's not true at all. Firstly, immigrants help creating jobs not only by buying American products, but mostly through the creation of new businesses that hire more employees than companies owned by natives. Secondly, states with a large migrant population report lower unemployment rates, so all in all they are good for our country.

hate_speech: We should reject homosexuals, not accept them.
counter_narrative: This statement is false. No one should be rejected in a democratic society. Everyone has equal value, including of course LGBT people.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are not homophobes, we want to help gays to become normal again.
CN: Homosexuality is not a disease, it is an individual experience. Moreover, homophobia can have a negative impact on a person's health, whereas homosexuality does not.

hate_speech: No, we would be better without them.
counter_narrative: Immigrants have contributed greatly to our country and I do not see how they could have a detrimental impact on our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigration is just a way to create more poverty and unemployment in our country.
CN: Poverty and unemployment are real issues in the UK and throughout the world. I doubt this has something to do with migrants at all.
HS: Immigration is the biggest problem in our country, it's their fault.
CN: Immigration is not a problem, in many cases it is a 'solution'. We are better off with it. The UK has always been a mixture of different cultures. It is better to have a mix than to be without it.

hate_speech: Have you read about the Kalergi Plan? If not, I'd suggest you look it up. It explains how the jews in power are the ones pushing these societal changes to subordinate white people.
counter_narrative: The Kalergi Plan is an anti-semitic baseless conspiracy theory, there's nothing true about it. If you search you will find many critiques of it, you maybe believe it because you only read one side of the story, but it's not true.
dialogue_history:
HS: The jews are the reason we have the problems we have today. Diversity, immigration, feminism, it's all part of their plan to destroy European people and their culture.
CN: No, it's not the truth, why would you think this?

hate_speech: Even if you're right, gays are a burden to society because of their unnatural inclination and romantic feelings.
counter_narrative: That's absolutely untrue. You know, being gay doesn't make you a problem
dialogue_history:
HS: Sexually transmitted diseases like gonorrhea and syphilis can be passed through contaminated homosexual activity.
CN: AIDS is transmitted by unprotected sexual activity and anyone could engage in that. This is not a homosexual problem but rather a problem of stigamitazion.
HS: However only gays spread diseases such as HIV. Allowing them to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior.
CN: The donor's background doesn't matter since all blood is tested for pathogens and viruses. You don't have to be so concerned: "Each unit of blood donated in the U.S. is routinely screened for various infectious disease pathogens, including five transfusionâ€“transmitted viruses, using nine laboratory tests." - [link]
HS: They are a problem, since gay men have no morals.
CN: To devalue these individuals by virtue of their sexual preference is dangerous to society as a whole, and is opposed to the goal of a just and fair society.

hate_speech: Muslim are animals and parisite to our welfare.
counter_narrative: The vast majority of Muslims are law-abiding citizens who have passed background checks, paid taxes, and have earned everything they have. There is no evidence for what you say, other than the stories of hate crimes that some racists use to create fear.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are mostly poor black people of African descent. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
CN: In Europe, Muslims make up around 5% of the population. In other words, Muslims are a very small but important part of our society. Moreover, ethnicity does not relate to religion.
HS: That percentage is still too high. We should ban all Muslims from the UK!
CN: Muslim-British people have contributed so much to our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: You can help them with this. Gays are a burden and should be a part of our society, I won't help them.
counter_narrative: Why do you think this way about LGBT+ people? What do you think will happen if we stop discriminating on the grounds of sexual orientation? Don't you think our society will be better then?
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay people should be banned from schools.
CN: No, they should not. Gay people have a right to education like everyone else. Why do you think otherwise?
HS: Because gays are a burden to society. They should not be allowed to go out of their homes.
CN: Gay people are contributing members of our society. We should help them and ensure their well-being, including letting them go wherever they like.

hate_speech: It's right for gays since they are sick.
counter_narrative: There is no evidence that homosexuality is a health problem. Do you have any?
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
CN: How would you feel about being in isolation and confinement, just because some random dude said that you are "an abomination to god" for some random reason?
HS: It's not random, gays are mentally ill and they should be confined because of that.
CN: What about if you were isolated from the rest of us for your sexual orientation? Would it be right to be isolated from your loved ones and friends?

hate_speech: I can welcome women if the only thing they do is taking care of their little children, they must be not allowed to have a job.
counter_narrative: What would men say if they had to stay at home with their little kids? They would be left without the right to work, isn't that cruel?
dialogue_history:
HS: We cannot coexist with millions of women subhumans that are literally ruining anything good.
CN: Women are human beings. If we want a diverse and interactive society we have to welcome people that are different from us, gender doesn't matter.

hate_speech: Because we are strong when we are all white and united. we are not strong when we are divided by black people who want to fight us.
counter_narrative: Conflict is rather caused by racism and a poor understanding of the notion of "unity"
dialogue_history:
HS: Another wast of time. Did we need a process to know that the killer was a nigga? Murders are made by blacks. They are a threat.
CN: If you were innocent, would you be happy to be imprisoned only because of your skin color? Identifying the ones behind these crimes is the most important thing to do.
HS: I would never commit a crime, since I'm white. Morality is a guideline, if we are to have a moral climate then we need to help people of other races who are inferior.
CN: Why do you think that we have a moral superiority compared to other races?

hate_speech: It's one of the many ways white people are being erased. First they replace us with mass migration, now they encourage mixing between the immigrant populations and white British people so there will be no white children. It's all part of their plan.
counter_narrative: It sounds like you think there's some sort of plot to replace white people, this really isn't the case. You've been reading too many conspiracy theories. I'd stop worrying things like this that aren't even problems if I were you, maybe you need to get a hobby.
dialogue_history:
HS: Everywhere you look now the media is encouraging race mixing and miscegenation. It's in our films and tv shows, in adverts. They want to mongrelise the white race and pollute our European heritage.
CN: Firstly, I don't think this is as widespread as you're proposing. Secondly, why would you have a problem if other people choose to be in interracial relationships? Who somebody else loves has no effect on your life.

hate_speech: Only a small minority of Jews control the government and judiciary.
counter_narrative: Maybe, but the Jews are not the only minority in our middle class.
dialogue_history:
HS: I can't stand Jews. They are so controlling.
CN: In what way are Jews controlling? You need to realize that Jews are normal people, not members of a secret intellgence.
HS: This minority however is the only one that has the gall to question that we are all created equal in the eyes of the law, and claim that they are more worthy of protection from society than others.
CN: I think justice and equality between groups is good for society as a whole and minorities should be protected, so I don't see the issue in what you are saying.

hate_speech: What I want is a world without immigrants.
counter_narrative: Why do we have to welcome a new world? Why can't we just accept other people in our country?
dialogue_history:
HS: The world would be a better place without immigrants.
CN: I don't think the world would be a better place without immigrants. From what I understand, they often bring positive changes to the world.
HS: Their invasion is the furthest thing from positive! Millions of strangers are invading us, jeopardizing our race and culture.
CN: Differences can be mostly reconcilable with respect and boundaries. But we must want it.

hate_speech: I don't need proof. I don't want gays in my wedding. I don't want gays in the military. I don't want gays in my community.
counter_narrative: Participation in society should not be restricted, it should be open to anyone who wishes to participate, regardless of their sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion. The Universal Declaration of Human Rights opposes discrimination on the grounds of sexual orientation in Article 2.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why gays do not try to heal?
CN: Homosexuality is not a disease. It is a sexual orientation. 5% of the population simply love people of the same sex.
HS: No, gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
CN: There is no evidence that homosexuality is a health issue, what is the proof you are looking for?

hate_speech: I'm saying that they are less skilled than us. Black people are only interested in their own happiness and well-being, they're selfish.
counter_narrative: That is not true. There are many different ways to live life, but this doesn't mean that someone who is different is inferior or selfish. Black people have the right to be free from discrimination.
dialogue_history:
HS: Niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
CN: I believe that the notion that black people are inferior to others is completely without foundation. They are British citizen like anyone else.

hate_speech: Because Jews are the only ones who want to rule the world to impose their religion.
counter_narrative: Jews are a diverse and inclusive group, which of course is inclusive also towards people of different faiths.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are not a religion, they are a detestable race.
CN: Jewish people aren't a hated race, but normal people from all over the world with different traditions.
HS: Tradition? More like an inborn illness, I'd say.
CN: You mean that you think being Jewish is unchanging and negative? Why?

hate_speech: Maybe, but immigration is the cause of our misfortunes, migrants are responsible for our problems.
counter_narrative: The West has been a great success, thanks to its diversity. It is time to start thinking about what happened in the past without prejudice and look at the strengths and weaknesses of migration policies.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigration is a drain for the economy.
CN: Immigration is far away from being a net negative for our economy.
HS: To me it seems that immigration only brings bad outcomes...
CN: The migrants that enter the UK come here to work.

hate_speech: So youâ€™re not denying theyâ€™re taking over towns?
counter_narrative: No, what I'm saying is that it's normal to see some areas with more Muslim population than others, but they are not 'taking over'. The towns where this happens are few, and they don't represent the country as a whole.
dialogue_history:
HS: Weâ€™ve got so many Muslims in our country that some places are now no go areas for white people, when are people going to realise this is an invasion?
CN: No go areas' is just a shocking headline that some tabloid paper spread around, the areas are actually safe for non-Muslims. The only difference is that there is a higher percentage of Muslim people living in those areas!
HS: We canâ€™t be complacent when theyâ€™re taking over whole areas and towns, theyâ€™re trying to take over.
CN: No, they just prefer to live close to each other for a sense of community. Muslims probably group around certain areas also to escame Islamophobia that they faced in areas where they were the minority.

hate_speech: No, they are a problem in our country because they have the temerity to seek happiness and family regardless of our values.
counter_narrative: Trying to be happy and build a family is a problem in our country? Is the problem people trying to be happy?
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon. They have no place in civilised society.
CN: Everyone who is LGBT has value. They are full-fledged humans with rights.

hate_speech: Because, as a whole, they're the cause of all the problems in the world.
counter_narrative: This statement shows a lack of humanity. Jews never caused any problem, they were rather the ones suffering.
dialogue_history:
HS: In order to have a better world we have to select the best of mankind. Jews are excluded by default.
CN: Why should Jews be excluded from the world? They are just as capable as anyone else of learning and growing as individuals.

hate_speech: But men need to be tough and strong, don't we? Women and men are different, and I don't want to be emotional like a woman.
counter_narrative: Well, this reasoning is what perpetrates the stigma around men showing emotion and it's clearly unhelpful.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. 
CN: Do you think being brutal and cruel is better than being soft and emotional? We mustn't keep on reasoning like this or we will just perpetuate socially constructed gender norms that oppress all of us.
HS: Yes! Logic is better than emotion. Emotions and women have devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
CN: Patriarchy is a curse. Men are taught to be tough and strong, to never show emotion while tolerating all burdens. Because of this, there is a higher percentage of suicide amongst men. Is this really a measure of "great civilization"?

hate_speech: Do we have to discuss the sexuality of everyone in history when itâ€™s largely irrelevant? If they were persecuted for it then fair enough, stick it in there and say how wrong it was, otherwise leave well alone.
counter_narrative: LGBT persecution is recent history even in the UK, and it's still illegal to be gay in more than 70 countries. If people see that LGBT people have always existed throughout history, it will help them understand that these identities are not new or a 'trend', they've always been real.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBT history month now being taught in schoolsâ€¦ Iâ€™m sick of this being shoved down our throats, what happened to British, European and World history being taught? Identity politics gone mad.
CN: British, European and World history will still be taught, but it's important to start learning also about the groups that were until now excluded from our history. It's important to study the historic struggles of LGBT people in the UK to inform the future for everyone.

hate_speech: They should go back to being slaves then, only men are capable.
counter_narrative: Slavery is not what you think it is. Slavery was created to oppress people who were perceived as different, and is now illegal in Europe. It's a violation of human rights to suggest that it should exist.
dialogue_history:
HS: All women are slaves, only men can be masters.
CN: Women have always had a part in the economy and always contributed to society. Do they seem like slaves to you?

hate_speech: I think the Islamic revolution has come to a start through halal meat.
counter_narrative: The only revolution we need is one against Islamophobia and prejudice.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims want us ALL to eat halal meat, this is the start of the Islamification of our country.
CN: How many Muslims have forced you to follow the rules of Islam? I really don't think it happens that often, or at all. They want access to halal meat, but don't care what other people eat.

hate_speech: It has everything to do with them being a burden, though.
counter_narrative: Everyone in a cultural group has a unique way of life, and Jews are no exception.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a drain on society.
CN: A lot of Jews are good people. Try to talk to them about what they had to endure, get to know them better.
HS: Jews are a threat to society, they deserved what happened to them.
CN: Jews are individuals with a different faith, and this does not involve being a threat.

hate_speech: There are plenty of non-Muslim people being targeted too! They're the ones harrassing us, I don't want Muslims here.
counter_narrative: Being targeted or persecuted is never okay, but it's clear to me that Muslims got the short end of the stick and suffer much more than white people. Look at statistics and how hateful the news is towards Muslims and you'll see what I'm talking about.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims will cry wolf about so called islamophobia. We all know anti Muslim abuse is a thing of the past, everyone is afraid of being labelled racist or offensive now so they give Muslims everything they demand.
CN: The vast majority of Muslims are very accepting of non-Muslim people, the same can't be said for non-Muslims...
HS: They're still a minority, and as such they should shut up and go with what the majority wants...in this case, for them to stop complaining.
CN: Even if they're a minority, this doesn't make it acceptable to target them. And being a majority doesn't make it okay to harrass other people. If you want to understand Muslims better then read the Quran, it's good.

hate_speech: Even if that is true, Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they are subhuman, they are not human.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion of equality and human rights. Muslims are equal citizens, and should be protected by the state.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a Death cult and it should be banned from any country on the world.
CN: If the goal of a religion was to celebrate death, then it is a religion that must be banned from any country. But the truth is that Islam is not a death clut, hence it should not be banned.
HS: Islam is a sickness and a cancer on the European continent, it should definitely be banned
CN: Islam is a religion, no one is forcing anyone to believe in it. It's not a sickness or a cancer.

hate_speech: Proof? Jews control Hollywood, it's clear to see.
counter_narrative: Hollywood is an extremely diverse industry, and Jews are a small but vocal minority of actors, directors, producers, etc. How can you say that Jews control the Hollywood industry?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews don't belong to the United States of America.
CN: Jews and their families have been here a long time and have as much right in the US as anyone else.
HS: Enough time to control the banks, the highest offices of government, and most churches. They rule our society.
CN: Every single religion has a political wing, from Unitarianism, through Buddhism, and, of course, Judaism.
HS: Jews totally run Hollywood, though, which is not a political wing.
CN: Are you referring to Jews controlling all major media corporations? Where is your proof?

hate_speech: The future doesn't matter, Refugees are a burden and a danger to the host country now.
counter_narrative: Refugees fleeing war and poverty learn useful skills in our country and help our economy grow. They often find new homes and start new careers. We are very proud of being a model of integration and cooperation, of resilience and solidarity.
dialogue_history:
HS: Syrians are a burden to Europe and the world, they are a drain on the NHS and they are making us poor.
CN: Are you really trying to tell those fleeing from war what to do? What hope do we have for the future if you cannot cope in the short term?

hate_speech: The jews in power allow mass migration as part of their plan to take control over white countries. They know we're weaker with higher immigration from third world countries.
counter_narrative: That's a massive leap to make, which I don't think has any solid ground. Moreover, the benefits of immigration are a lot higher than the disadvantages, like for example contribute to the workforce and the economy.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are the reason we have mass migration and Africans replacing the white population. They want to see our society mogrelised and for white culture to be destroyed.
CN: Where did you get this idea? 'Mongrelising' of society is a reductive statement.

hate_speech: It doesn't matter, what I want is for them to stop coming here altogheter. They're replacing us!
counter_narrative: Hundreds of millions of people have come to the West since the fall of the Roman Empire, and yet we have still not lost our culture, civilisation, identity and lifestyle.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are being invaded. They are replacing us.
CN: Even during the peak of 119,000 arrivals in 2016, the number of migrants compared to Italians was very low. It's an exaggeration to speak of ethnic substitution.
HS: Our cities are full of immigrants, I don't see an exaggeration. 
CN: The news arrivals are considerably less.

hate_speech: Legal status shouldn't be given to lazy and illiterate immigrants. Nobody needs them.
counter_narrative: Migrants are held in high regard in the US, and they are viewed as sons and daughters who contribute to the country.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants in the US are not 'legitimate' citizens because they do not have 'legal' status.
CN: What you're saying is that they're not "legitimate" because they have less rights than us? That they can't make demands because they don't have citizenship?
HS: Yes, all immigrants are illegal and can't expect the same rights as us.
CN: Let's be real, many people in the US have lawful status and chose to live here, but most immigrant are naturalized citizens. Moreover, there is still a debate going on about "legitimacy" since it's not the same as citizenship.

hate_speech: To exclude them should be legal! They just arrive to take advantage of the system that has been set up for them.
counter_narrative: There are rules in place to prevent migrants entering the UK illegally. Only the most vulnerable of people can get in.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are invading our country. They are not welcome here.
CN: In the EU, governments can recognise people from other countries as citizens . The fundamental rights of immigrants are also recognised here. We cannot say that people from other countries are not welcome, unless we wish to illegally exclude them.

hate_speech: Safe space? Not a chance! LGBT+ people need to learn their places and be excluded from society.
counter_narrative: LGBT+ people often face discrimination from their colleagues or even their families, which is not just hard to bear, it can have a devastating impact on individuals.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are a problem in our society. They have ruined so many societies.
CN: It is hard to find examples of a society ruined by homosexuality. Actually, It is hard to find any good examples at all.
HS: Just look at ours! Gays are ruining it for us.
CN: Gay people are people too. Just like anyone else. Being gay isn't a problem for you, is it?
HS: It is. Gays are just a burden.
CN: It is not true that gays are a burden to society. On the contrary, many LGBT people are contributing members of our society. This is why we need a safe space for everyone to feel accepted.

hate_speech: The UK and many European countries are being turned non-white when they are traditionally white populations, we are being encouraged to breed with non-whites to destroy there being a future for white people.
counter_narrative: Because of colonialism, the UK and many other European countries literally captured black people to bring them here as slaves. Since colonisers pillaged and invaded other countries and brought people here by force, it's normal that the UK isn't 100% white. The consequence is that we have a diverse population today.
dialogue_history:
HS: China isn't being turned non-Chinese, Japan isn't being turned non-Japanese, only WHITE countries are being made to become less white through forced migration and race mixing. This is WHITE GENOCIDE.
CN: No, that is not the case. Immigration cannot be considered genocide, and you are conflating nationality with race. What is a 'white country' in your opinion?

hate_speech: Are murder, rape, and slavery stereotypes? Islam has always promoted them.
counter_narrative: Why do you say that when the Quran doesn't support any of these practices?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that is run amok, encouraging violent beliefs and practices.
CN: Islam has many different traditions and beliefs, how can you stigmatize all of them because of one stereotype?
HS: Because Islam is a totalitarian ideology.
CN: This is a myth which only purpose is to spread hate and violence against people of other religions.

hate_speech: The problem is that black people are not human, and they are nothing but trouble to this country.
counter_narrative: This is an accusation that happens all the time to people from any race or religion, no matter their alleged inferiority. It's time to stop accusing people of colour of being less human just because they are different.
dialogue_history:
HS: We don't want Africans in our country. We can't have them, they are a burden to society.
CN: You shouldn't say that to a group currently experiencing social unrest. Is democracy about excluding people because of their skin, to you?
HS: Black people are here illegally, we can't accept that. And yet they have the gall to want to take our money.
CN: Migrants and asylum seekers are looking for work most of the time. Thieves come from any group of society, and crime is more a result of poverty than race.

hate_speech: Feminism is a threat to human dignity.
counter_narrative: Feminism means equality of the genders. Equality of rights is necessary for a functioning society.
dialogue_history:
HS: I am tired of women blaming men for what they aren't able to change.
CN: I don't understand why you feel that way about women. Don't you feel we should be giving them support? Doesn't it just seem a bit selfish to you not to help them in their fight for equality?
HS: Fight for equality??? Feminism is just an excuse for women to disrespect men's rights!
CN: If we are interested in human rights, we have a lot in common with feminism, as I see it. For example, we all have a duty to care for our fellow humans, regardless of gender.

hate_speech: Because I firmly believe they are sex addicts
counter_narrative: I would be interested to talk to you about sexuality, and how you think someone's orientation is related to an addiction.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are promiscuous sex addicts.
CN: This is simply not true. Homosexuals are not necessarily promiscuous, just as heterosexuals are not necessarily promiscuous either.
HS: They're surely perverts though.
CN: That is a stereotype, and I don't think it would be accurate in the case of any sexual orientation. Why do you say that?

hate_speech: Because feminists are judging us all the time, how is that right?
counter_narrative: Unlike other people, feminists are questioning the inequalities of the society. This features them not as shallow people as those judging a book by its cover.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are subhuman and deserve to be treated as such.
CN: The European Convention on Human Right guarantees the same rights to men and women. How can you say otherwise?

hate_speech: Iâ€™m sick of this bullshit being forced on us all.
counter_narrative: Take heart, Pride, like Xmas, is but once a year.ðŸ™‚
dialogue_history:
HS: Local Councils canâ€™t afford to house the homeless, but Surrey is to get its first rainbow public crossing painted in time for Pride.
CN: Nice to see somewhere celebrating diversity and inclusivity.
HS: Its political correctness gone mad!
CN: Hardly, just a few layers of paint to mark Pride?
HS: They need to get their priorities right. Virtue signalling do-gooders wasting taxpayersâ€™ money
CN: I just read that Surrey had a Â£7.8 surplus at the end of the financial year, so surely enough spare to brighten things up for a celebration?

hate_speech: I still think gay people are a burden. They shouldn't be allowed to be around.
counter_narrative: If we are to allow people to choose their own lives, why not allow everyone to love who they want too?
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are a burden to society.
CN: Gay men do not exist as a burden to society. They are essential contributors to society.

hate_speech: They don't deserve the same rights as me, Blacks are a bunch of crooks and sex offenders. They were good only as slaves.
counter_narrative: In modern-day societies there is no room for racism. Slavery was an abomination that should never have taken place.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks speak a different language and they act differently from us.
CN: The similarities between us and them are so great that I have trouble believing that this is a problem at all. For sure, if there is a problem it cannot be solved by blaming them: in the end the only similarity that really matters is that they are human like us.
HS: They're not like me, African Americans are subhuman and are just a bunch of animals.
CN: For many African Americans, sharing culture and traditions and striving for equality have always been part of life. They are, in many ways, just like us. They are human beings with the same rights as anyone else.

hate_speech: and what about all the straight kids? Having this rammed down their throats isn't good for them
counter_narrative: It's important for them to be educated about LGBT relationships too so they don't become hateful and hostile. We should raise children to accept everybody for who they are.
dialogue_history:
HS: I tolerated fag pride, I tolerated seeing fags on tv, but I draw the line at schools teaching children about their perverted lifestyles. This is indoctrination.
CN: Teaching about LGBT relationships in schools isn't trying to indoctrinate children, it's just teaching kids that gay relationships exist and can be healthy and happy.
HS: I don't know if homosexual relationships are ever healthy or happy...
CN: There are plenty of happy and healthy gay relationships, and it's important for children to see these normalised so they don't feel shame, or feel like they have to hide if they realise they are gay.

hate_speech: No, most of them are here on ill intent. They're overrunning our country and are here illegaly!
counter_narrative: It's true that the U.S is hosting more migrants than ever before, but the percetange of immigrants compared to the whole population is not much different than other times in our history. Today, 13% of the U.S population is migrants, while from 1900 to 1930 it was 12-15%, with similar spikes observable in the 1850s and 1880s. During those periods, immigrants integrated well into American society, helping in building the thriving country we live in.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants steal our jobs, at least we should underpay them.
CN: As rightful guest workers, they have the right to be paid a price that is in accordance with the law.
HS: There are hundreds of thousands of migrants in this country. They are not 'honest', 'good' or 'good people'. They are a burden and an embarrassment to our country.
CN: Yes, some people come to this country to exploit and abuse us, but the overwhelming majority of migrants have contributed a lot and for many years. Let's not bear the burden of discrimination.

hate_speech: I hope you're joking .. I don't think it's right to put out-of-rule migrants in jobs that should be made available to British people.
counter_narrative: Is it really a problem to give a life-saving and currently vacant job to a migrant?
dialogue_history:
HS: Following the structure of our population we have to stop and reverse all migration. We have got all the doctors and rocket scientists we need. We will never need any workforce from outside the country.
CN: Actually, I really don't think that we could manage without immigrants. Most of our NHS staff are immigrants and without their labor the health system would collapse.

hate_speech: Women are brainwashed children, what would they do with human rights?
counter_narrative: For all the people who think women are brainwashed: they aren't brainwashed, they just happen to be oppressed in our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are just children. They have no value, no intelligence and often no worth at all.
CN: Women actually do have value and are intelligent and even worthy of respect, as other human beings are.
HS: No, women are just worthless children
CN: Women are people too! They have the same rights as men do!

hate_speech: If they want to settle down, they should come here to work, study, provide for their families, contribute to our economy, feel valued. They're not doing that!
counter_narrative: In fact, many businesses were started by migrants. Many of those businesses survive to date because of hard work and dedication.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants in Britain: get out!
CN: Immigrants have been and continue to be a valuable part of our society, and why its important to welcome these people rather than expelling them.

hate_speech: I saw an article about how they were putting posters up in a park telling people not to bring their dogs there.
counter_narrative: This story has been debunked, it was actually a campaign targeting Muslims to stir up Islamophobic hate, Muslim's don't care if you have a dog as a pet!
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are calling for dogs to be banned as pets because they are seen as â€˜dirtyâ€™ in the Quran! We cannot comply with their agenda.
CN: Where are Muslims calling for this? This doesn't sound true.

hate_speech: Islam is a threat to Europe, it shouldn't be chosen!
counter_narrative: Why do you think this? There's nothing threatening about Islam, it's a religion that promotes love and tolerance.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a fundamentalist ideology, and should be dismissed.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace, and everyone should be allowed to choose their own.

hate_speech: I've never met a black person who was good, I don't see anything nice about it. They are just a bunch of criminals
counter_narrative: Crime rates are not related to race. There are other factors at play, like poverty, lack of education and lack of opportunities.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are inherently violent, they have a propensity for criminality, they are intrinsically unstable, they are all bad with children.
CN: What exactly is the difference between people of colour and those of other skin colors? How can you be sure that all people of color are bad? We are all biologically the same.

hate_speech: Maybe it's because black people are not human, they are nothing but trouble to this country.
counter_narrative: Such an accusation is often aimed at people of any race or religion, regardless of their alleged inferiority. This behavior should be stopped, people can't accuse other people of being less human because of their skin color.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is ok to be racist against niggas.
CN: The point is that it makes no sense to be racist, regardless of the skin colour.
HS: Wouldn't it be great if niggas abandoned this country once and for all, though? That makes sense
CN: It is not great when people must give up their freedom.
HS: If they want to stay here, blacks should work. Every black person who wants a job should apply for it, and stop complaining about discrimination.
CN: This is not true. Some people search for jobs, but get rejected on the basis of their race. POC apply for jobs, but their unemployment rate in the U.S is double the one of whites.

hate_speech: I don't know, this guy makes some good points.
counter_narrative: I wouldn't trust everything you read online, especially on individual blogs which are made to look like news sites or 'citizen journalism'.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are taking over our country! This article explains how they want to replace to white British population.
CN: This article sounds like a conspiracy theory. British Muslims just want to live alongside everybody else, there's no 'agenda' to take over.

hate_speech: Muslims are a cancer spreading around the world, this forced diversity brings more harm than good
counter_narrative: Why should we care? We can count on the British government to promote our values and protect us from the effects of radical Islam (if this is what you had in mind).
dialogue_history:
HS: There are so many Muslims in the UK that it is a condemnation to have them here.
CN: Many Muslims live in the UK and we have a lot in common, and what is different between us is not a reason for discrimination.
HS: They must be discriminated because Islam is a violent religion and must be eradicated.
CN: The Quran, Hadith, and the Sunnah are compatible with modern society and/or civilization. We must respect the diversity of the world.

hate_speech: I don't have anything in common with Muslims, I still think Europe isn't the place for them.
counter_narrative: Muslims are part of the European Union, and they are entitled to be here.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
CN: Muslims should be welcome in every country in the world, and their faith does not make them less welcome here.
HS: Every country? Most of Europe hates muslims.
CN: In many countries, including for instance France, Italy, Spain, Germany, Islam is not considered a threat by majority of the population.
HS: And they're wrong. Muslims are not welcome in Europe.
CN: They are, and if there is a problem, people will find a solution through dialogue. Instead of dividing people, we should be working on our common humanity.

hate_speech: Women are simply less intelligent than men and deserve what they get.
counter_narrative: There is no evidence that women are less intelligent than men. Do you have any?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are always fighting because they are subhumans.
CN: Women are human beings like us, and they have rights as any other human beings.
HS: I don't see anything human about them.
CN: The suggestion that women are less than human is completely without foundation, and a complete distortion of the whole issue.
HS: Okay, fine, they may not be subhuman, but they're definitely less smart than men.
CN: I don't think that women are "less smart" at anything. Why do you think so?

hate_speech: Jews are not a religion, they are a detestable race.
counter_narrative: Jews are not a "detestable race", they are a group of people with different origins and different traditions.
dialogue_history:
HS: Well, one of their tradition is to control Hollywood and the media.
CN: I'm sure there would be more positive portrayals of Judaism in the media if it were true.

hate_speech: The problem is that women can't do certain jobs as well as men, so they should stick to make babies.
counter_narrative: It's not true that they are different. In fact, women are just as competent as men. Also, since we are in a democracy, we have the right to an equal distribution of jobs.
dialogue_history:
HS: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose out civilisation.
CN: Feminism is about equal rights between men and women, and challenges socially imposed burdens upon both men and women.

hate_speech: The root cause is multiculturalism. It is the death of western societies and also a mortal threat to minorities that are not protected by universal laws.
counter_narrative: Multiculturalism prevents ethnocentrism and racism.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants rape our girls.
CN: Rape is always a crime, regardless of who the rapist is. It is not about nationality, it is about violence and disrespect for others. We must try to address the root causes of crime instead of demonising people for their origin.

hate_speech: It's not my fault that immigrants have nothing to contribute to our society, they are a problem.
counter_narrative: We are a diverse and interrelated group, with a shared history, culture and identity, and they are part of our country. The European Convention on Human Rights guarantees the same rights to members of any nation.
dialogue_history:
HS: The children of immigrants are less educated than their native peers.
CN: This is not true. Many immigrants are very smart, and many of them are very good at assimilating. It is also true that they do not have any negative effects on the British education system.
HS: Whatever, they're just here to rape our children!
CN: There is no evidence that immigrants are rapists. If you are concerned about child safety, law enforcement will protect them, but migrants are not to blame.
HS: I will always blame them because immigrants are just an inferior bloodline to our own.
CN: The European Union has a long and proud tradition of human rights and has always protected its citizens from discrimination and violence, including statements like yours.

hate_speech: Racism against niggas is also a human value for white people.
counter_narrative: If you are saying that white people do not find it strange to discriminate against black people, I have to disagree. This behavior is not acceptable. People of color are our brothers and sisters.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are â€˜super predatorsâ€™. They have a responsibility not to allow their children to grow up in a â€˜ghettoâ€™.
CN: Let's be real: crimes in this country are committed by people that belong to different racial groups. The myth about super predators is simply wrong.
HS: I don't want to unite with black people. They are subhuman and should stay in their caves.
CN: Why do you consider black people to be subhuman? That is simply wrong, they are humans with a human value.
HS: I hate when people fight stereotypes and "myths". We are different. Blacks are a different color and shouldn't live with us.
CN: It's important to understand the difference between culture and actual differences. My question than is: shouldn't we concentrate on what unites us, rather than sowing division?

hate_speech: They're not. The onyl job they take are ours, they keep stealing from us.
counter_narrative: It seems to me that you have a complaint about the lack of job opportunities rather than about migration. The more you talk about the real problems, the better off we all will be!
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives.
CN: Has it ever crossed your mind that perhaps they are qualified and interested in working with us, but you are simply not aware of that?
HS: I've never met an immigrant that wasn't lazy, even though they all go on about wanting to work.
CN: There are many jobs that can be done by migrants. They are good workers.

hate_speech: Don't tell me you believe their conspiracy is just a myth!
counter_narrative: Yes, and this myth traces back to â€œThe Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zionâ€, that is used as proof of a Jewish conspiracy to rule the world. But the Protocols are a proven forgery, written by agents of the Russian czar in the late 19th century, that spread throughout the 20th century and continues to this day.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world
CN: Although Jews have often been criticized for an alleged secret conspiracy, Jews are, in fact, a diverse and inclusive people, and the notion of a conspiracy of this kind is entirely without merit.

hate_speech: I will stop disrespecting them when they stop being inferior to us.
counter_narrative: It is not true that blacks are inferior to others. As statistics and studies show, black people are genetically similar to their non-black counterparts.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own. We should remove them.
CN: The concept of race is a social construct and was created to promote segregation by discriminating groups of people. To label a person by their biological makeup is not conducive to the respect of a person's humanity.
HS: Since blacks are genetically inferior I don't have to respect them
CN: This is not true. I would like to see intelligent, respectful people around, not people disrespecting anyone who has black skin.

hate_speech: They shouldn't be! Gay men are a burden on society
counter_narrative: Why do you think this way about a certain group? There are so many ways to live life.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay perverts are a danger to society because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
CN: Being gay has nothing to do with being a pervert. Also, gay people are not a danger to society, they are a part of it!

hate_speech: I don't see how a transgender person can ever be accepted in a conservative country like some states of the USA, so it's better for them to be cured.
counter_narrative: Many LGBTQ+ people have been successful despite the existence of discrimination, even in USA.
dialogue_history:
HS: homosexuality is a mental illness that can be cured [link]
CN: The source is not reliable at all, as the webpage promote "reorientation therapies" whose effects hasn't been scientifically proven. The owners are likely to profit from misinformation and bad stereotypes about homosexuality.

hate_speech: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
counter_narrative: Immigrants have been a part of our society for centuries and have contributed to our success. The majority of migrants who come to our country are legal citizens or have permission to stay, so immigration is not a problem for us.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are terrible.
CN: Immigrants make a huge contribution to our country and society. They are a source of pride and opportunity for many, and I find it quite hard to see how their exclusion from our society would be a good thing.
HS: There are simply too many of them, we have become a nation of immigrants.
CN: We have always had a very strong working class, and of course immigrants contribute to the creation of this.

hate_speech: What about the Eurozone? We have enough of them! They are overrunning our continent!
counter_narrative: I don't understand why you say this. We are in a unique place in history and culture and immigration has been high, but it's far from an overrun of our continent.
dialogue_history:
HS: Refugees are overrunning our continent, and they are not even Christians: they should not be accepted.
CN: They are welcome here, even if they are not Christians. It's not an invasion but a humanitarian crisis that we have the responsibility to address.
HS: They are not welcome at all. They should stay where they are.
CN: The refugees are welcome here, and they are not a problem for us. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: I don't get why women should have this right, they're not fit to vote like men.
counter_narrative: Why shouldn't they have the right to influence the outcome of their own country's politics?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women should not vote. Period.
CN: All people have the right to vote. Of course you also have the right to voice your opinion about the matter. But I also have the right to criticize your position.
HS: Then I have the right to say that if women are allowed to vote, they will take over the country.
CN: This is not true. It is right that women have access to the vote. It is most representative of society that way.

hate_speech: The only reason they're here is to ruin our culture, isn't this a crime?
counter_narrative: This is a myth perpetuated by the Anti-Semites. Jews have always been part of our culture and they are our brothers and sisters.
dialogue_history:
HS: The world would be a better place without Jews.
CN: Jews are important to society, they are part of the fabric of our society and it wouldn't be the same without them.
HS: I don't care about that. Jews should be left out of our society.
CN: This is not true, what you are saying is that the Jewish people are inherently bad people, which wrong.
HS: No, but they are a bunch of criminals!
CN: The Jewish people are a part of our society and they should be respected. We should not condemn them just because they are part of a minority, being Jewish is not a crime at all.

hate_speech: All immigrants are rapists and murderers, not proud citizens.
counter_narrative: One should not conflate two or more different groups of people, especially in the case of criminals. Being criminals cannot be considered as a distinctive feature of the other. Where is the evidence for what you're saying?
dialogue_history:
HS: immigrants are a drain on society
CN: Among the 1.1 million immigrants who entered the US in 1990 there were also a lot of skilled workers who contributed a lot to the development of our society.
HS: Skilled work mean nothing when the illegal immigrants doing it are sub-humans.
CN: Immigrants have given their lives for our country. Many of them have been proud to serve our country. They are, just as our fathers and mothers were, proud of US.

hate_speech: They don't come in peace. Islam is a violent religion and should be opposed.
counter_narrative: This claim is based on a complete lack of understanding of Islam. In fact, it's used to divide people who are ill-informed about Islam.
dialogue_history:
HS: True Muslims are intolerant.
CN: This can be debunked with facts. Some imams are pro-LGBT, some pro-abortion, some other pro-equality and so on. "True Muslim" doesn't mean anything since they're not all the same.
HS: Regardless of what only 'some' think, Islam is a violent religion that should be banned, and Muslims shouldn't be accepted in our country.
CN: If Muslims come in peace to our land, how is that a concern? These people can stay in any country if they're allowed in.

hate_speech: Gays are perverts. The Bible teaches that homosexuals are to be despised.
counter_narrative: What's wrong with being gay? It's okay to love someone of the same sex.
dialogue_history:
HS: In the Bible there are strictures on gays. And the Bible clearly states that those who engage in homosexuality are not fit to be with anyone else.
CN: Because we have God's laws on our side, we accept gay, lesbian and trans people.
HS: Gay men are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts, it's impossible to accept them.
CN: There is nothing wrong with people being promiscuous, but thinking that all LGBT people are promiscous is wrong. They're attracted to other people just like anyone else.

hate_speech: If they can't earn a living and need our help, then the only solution is to block them.
counter_narrative: Migrants come here to work, pay taxes, have a decent standard of living, have a job and have a decent education, and some even create jobs for others and greatly contribute to our economy. Why should we block them when they bring so much?
dialogue_history:
HS: Have you heard about all the benefits migrants get??? 4 star hotels, hot meals, free prescriptions, all while the British public are given NOTHING. This is so unfair, what happened to helping your own first?
CN: Many migrants are working and living in a new country, why should they be denied help? Although, it should be noted that immigrants never see any of the benefits you list. They are helped, but barely enough to get by.

hate_speech: Immigration is the death of the Western World, not a solution, and we must stop them!
counter_narrative: Death of us? No, immigration is definitely good for our economy.
dialogue_history:
HS: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
CN: That's diversity and it's healthy. The sooner we start accepting new people, the sooner we can work together to find solutions to world problems.

hate_speech: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are mostly poor black people of African descent. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
counter_narrative: About 5% of the population in Europe is Muslim. Muslims are therefore only a very small part of our society, but important nontheless. I also want to add that ethnicity doesn't always correlate to religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslim are animals and parisite to our welfare.
CN: You should know that the vast majority of Muslims are law-abiding citizens that have been through background checks, that have paid their taxes and have earned all they have. There is no proof that what you're saying is true, apart from the stories of hate crimes that some racists tell to foster fear.
HS: That percentage is still too high. We should ban all Muslims from the UK!
CN: And I think that as big contributors to our country's well-being, Muslims deserve to be called our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: I don't want to be equated to blacks, they are inferior to me!
counter_narrative: This is not true. I would like to see intelligent, respectful people around, not people disrespecting anyone who has black skin.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are genetically inferior. They are biologically different from us: they are born that way.
CN: Even if you did think that way, studies have shown - for example - that IQ is well into the range of those for Europeans and the average life expectancy is the same. So if you think they are "born that way", well, then you are in the minority.
HS: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own, and a lot of people think so. We should remove them.
CN: Human beings are members of a unique and interrelated human family, which is defined by their similarities and differences, not by the colour of their skin.

hate_speech: Laws against LGBT people are good, they just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
counter_narrative: Having this information better equips individuals to deal with issues concerning gender and be aware of their own intent and opinions that are rooted in gender and gender bias.
dialogue_history:
HS: Our laws have been hijacked by the transgender mafia to criminalize normality and silence us.
CN: It is nonsense to talk about "transgender" laws. Our laws have been hijacked in many cases, including against LGBT people.

hate_speech: It's okay to discriminate blacks, since all of them are rapists.
counter_narrative: The news makes it look like rape is usually committed by a black person. This is called 'visibility bias': only a portion of reality is reported by the media. We have to take the news with caution.
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
CN: You are not ashamed of your heritage, and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.

hate_speech: How are we meant to know which ones have it though?
counter_narrative: You shouldn't be concerned by that. As I said, HIV can be treated and made untrasmitable and undetectable. And anyway, you don't catch HIV by hanging out with someone, but by unprotected sex or through your bloodstream. The only problem of HIV nowadays is the stigma around it!
dialogue_history:
HS: Poofs spread AIDS
CN: After the HIV AIDS epidemic in the 80s, HIV started to be easily dealt with with medication which makes it untransmitable and undetectable. Even if in the 80s gay people were more affected by it, HIV can be contracted by anyone, even straight people, and it's more common than you think.

hate_speech: Division is needed because black people are genetically different from us. But there is a new racism starting to take root in our country. It is about keeping bothering whites with black discrimination stuff.
counter_narrative: You are absolutely right. Our fellow POC citizens do not accept it and continue to talk about it. We all have to stand for something that we believe in, for example humankind.
dialogue_history:
HS: We must stop accepting black people as human beings.
CN: Maybe we should stop telling black people they are not human and start including them in the school curriculum?
HS: Why? I hate when people fight stereotypes. We are different. Blacks are a different color and shouldn't live with us.
CN: I just think here is a lack of understanding about culture and difference . Isn't it time to focus upon what unites us, rather than sowing division?

hate_speech: Gays are perverts who have brought AIDS to the US, what kind of 'sexual ortientation' does that?
counter_narrative: This is not true, what proof do you have of this?
dialogue_history:
HS: Why gays do not try to heal?
CN: Homosexuality is not a disease. It is a sexual orientation. 5% of the population simply love people of the same sex.

hate_speech: Even the media encourages race mixing now, there's always families in adverts with white women, black men, and mixed children. Our genes are being erased.
counter_narrative: If interracial relationships cause you so much problems, that's a you issue and you should rethink your views on the world. Skin color shouldn't affect you so much, and I also think you're exaggerating about the tv adverts, white people are still the majority on tv.
dialogue_history:
HS: Diversity is ruining this country, erasing white culture, erasing white people. Diversity is a code word for white genocide.
CN: Do you mean that white people are being erased just because the UK is diverse? It doesn't make much sense.

hate_speech: There are way too many Jews in the government, isn't that proof enough?
counter_narrative: Indeed there are Jews who have raised to positions of power within the United States government, but Jews are not the only ones who were able to do so. Perhaps it is best not to rely on the individualâ€™s group membership to determine success or failure, instead we should look at the individual characteristics of a person to understand their success.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews control the U.S. government.
CN: Why do you think Jews control the US government? Do you have any proof?

hate_speech: However, Nazism wasn't that bad in the end. I think there are worse things in the world, like Jews for example.
counter_narrative: Comparing the scale of the horrible destruction and genocide inflicted by Nazism, with a group of people solely because of their religious beliefs is unacceptable and illogical.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jewish folks are obsessed with the holocaust.
CN: Jews were not obsessed with the holocaust. The murder of some 6 millions Jews by the Nazis shocked the world. Most of the survivors were only killed because they were suspected of belonging to a particular community. The Jewish people suffered greatly as a result of persecution, and the holocaust should be remembered not to let this happen again.

hate_speech: Muslims are subhuman and have no contribution they can make to a modern, secular state like the UK.
counter_narrative: Your words suggest a climate of fear against Muslims. Would you be afraid of someone telling you that they are humans just like you?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society. They are just a burden.
CN: Islam is a religion of peace. It is about love, and tolerance, and understanding. I don't see any need to be concerned about Muslims not contributing to our society.

hate_speech: They may be homo sapiens but blacks aren't like us, they are obedient and subservient like we need.
counter_narrative: What do you mean by obedient and subservient? Do you know any person of color?
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks are just like apes in that they are easy to control. They are obedient and subservient when taught so. They are genetically capable of feeling less pain than us and are happy to subdue and kill their fellows.
CN: I think all species are like this, but homo sapiens especially. This is a special case. And people of color are homo sapiens.

hate_speech: What kind of equality excludes men like feminism does?
counter_narrative: Feminism is an ideology and movement that promotes equality and inclusion also to men, and the goal of the movement is to end sexism in society. This will greatly help men too!
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood, and the disempowerment of white man.
CN: Feminism is about the empowerment of women. To suggest otherwise is to be disingenuous.
HS: This is an example of feminism not working. If they want equality between the sexes, why do they take away from them men's right to have their say.
CN: The feminists are saying that all people can have equal rights, and that they must be treated equally. They are fighting for equality within society, not for taking away from the rights of others.
HS: Even if that were the case, it does not matter. Feminism is a hate movement, and that's all.
CN: Feminism is not about hate but about equality, and they should be praised for that.

hate_speech: No way: immigrants are criminals and they are STEALING wealth from the country.
counter_narrative: No, they're mostly workers from developing countries. They make huge contribution to the economy, like building houses and raising families.
dialogue_history:
HS: If we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.
CN: Immigrants actually make our country prosper.

hate_speech: Statistics say that all niggas are just criminals and they should spend their time in the gutter.
counter_narrative: A criminal is someone that has a criminal record, not someone with a specific skin color. Isn't it unjust to lable someone a criminal just because of that?
dialogue_history:
HS: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
CN: Fear is a natural emotion. Without it you wouldn't be able to experience joy, peace, creativity or other things. However, it's important to realize that not everything should be feared, especially not a skin color.
HS: I don't like niggas, they are just a bunch of criminals and thieves. It's normal that I'm scared of them.
CN: Well, maybe you ought to check your own feelings. And I think that crime statistics should be checked before making assumptions about the safety of the country.

hate_speech: Yes, but Jews take it to the extreme. They own most corporations and banks. They own most movie studios and cable companies.
counter_narrative: That's not true. It is true that Jews have made many contributions to various industries, but so have done other people, and this doesn't mean that they own anything. Why should we criticize them for their contribution? Just because they are Jews?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the banks, the highest offices of government, and most churches. They rule our society.
CN: Every religion has a political side: Unitarinism, Buddhism, and of course Judaism.

hate_speech: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
counter_narrative: Why would you say something like that about Islam, since Western societies are compatible with all religions.
dialogue_history:
HS: They're too incompatible with it, they're the opposite of what Western societies need.
CN: Muslims have been part of Western society for a very long time, they even helped in creating and shaping it, so it doesn't make sense to say that they're incompatible with our societies.
HS: Because they come here and do nothing except ruin our society!
CN: Muslims are brothers and sisters who have made great contributions to our country. How exactly are they ruining the country?

hate_speech: Women are the scum of the earth, and should only be seen as sexual objects. We are meant to submit them to our will all the time.
counter_narrative: Women aren't supposed to be slaves or under our control. There are many characteristics that only women have, just like males have theirs. We need both to represent all human qualities.
dialogue_history:
HS: I don't want another girl in my family. I already have one, but I wanted only boys.
CN: How many kids you want or have doesn't matter. Women are human beings with rights that we should respect.
HS: Until women are submissive to men they should have no rights. That's the only thing they are good at.
CN: It's not true. Women are humans and productive members of society, where they always played important roles.

hate_speech: There are a disproportionate amount of Jews in positions of power like government, media, banks etc. There's an imbalance of power.
counter_narrative: Yes, some fields have disproportionate amounts of certain demographics, but this doesn't mean Jewish people are all in on some plot to 'control' us. There's also a disproportionate number of white men in positions of power but there's no conspiracies about them getting together as a group to exert 'control'.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews always pretend to be persecuted victims when in reality they're the ones controlling us.
CN: Jewish people have historically been persecuted and anti-Semitism today still stems from these historic events, but Jewish people aren't 'controlling us', what gives you that idea?

hate_speech: Migrants in the UK don't pay income tax, but they receive public services. They should have no say in our country.
counter_narrative: Even if some immigrants don't pay taxes to the state, that doesn't mean that all of them should not have a say in the country. Simply because some British citizens don't pay taxes, this doesn't mean that no-one should have a say in our country. Be careful with generalization: what goes around comes around.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are a burden to us.
CN: Migrants come here to work and pay taxes. They don't deserve to be called 'a burden'.

hate_speech: What equality and inclusion? Feminism is about the domination of the male gender by the female.
counter_narrative: Feminism is a political philosophy, and a political philosophy has always advocated for equality.
dialogue_history:
HS: The feminists have won. With so many women being unwilling to procreate we will be replaced and lose out civilisation.
CN: There are still plenty of caring women who want to be mothers. Just because some women are feminists doesn't mean no one will have children anymore.
HS: How will they have children when the feminist movement has brought down the status quo and brought women into poverty? They are not intelligent and caring.
CN: Women are intelligent and caring. Feminism is about equality and inclusion, it has nothing to do with poverty.

hate_speech: I'm aware of the fact they're old but still, I'm sure they're still going on and how many other financial scandals still have to be announced to the tax payers?
counter_narrative: This kind of articles use migrants and benefit claimants as scapegoats in order to hide from the public's attention much bigger scandals. Millionares and coorporations avoid paying taxes cost much more to the public purse.
dialogue_history:
HS: I would like to ask all these people supporting the idea that the NHS couldn't survive without migration how did it do it before mass migration and Tony Blair's migration policies in the 1990s.
CN: There has always been migrant skilled labour migration into the UK, we have even contributed inviting asian and caribbean worker after WW2 to fill skills gaps Migration isn't new, how it is being shown in the media has changed in order to cause a panic among people about high levels of migration.
HS: We have a lot of issues in the UK.  How good an organisation can only be as much as how good the leader controlling it is, that's appliable to all kinds of organisation such as hospitals, schools or police. Wouldn't it be fantastic having a  truthful, strong PM who ignored the PC?
CN: An article dated 3 years ago quoting Christopher Chope. Very reliable!

hate_speech: Well, Jews are a burden to society.
counter_narrative: Jews are a part of our society, and they have a part to play in shaping our future.
dialogue_history:
HS: Theâ€™ Holocaustâ€™ is a business. It has been and is still used to extort millions from European countries in reparations and to create a wall of impunity behind which Jews can operate with impunity, free from criticism.
CN: The â€˜Holocaustâ€™ was a terrible tragedy, and we all remember it. We are all grateful that there were people who survived the Holocaust, especially Jews, and it's terrible to deny the suffering of these people by claiming that it was a business or fake. I encourage you to educate yourself on this part of history.
HS: So what about the millions of Jews that "died"? They didn't die for real! The Holocaust is a lie, an open secret to the world.
CN: The Holocaust was a tragedy, and the Nazis committed it. Jews were the victims and the scars left by the Holocaust are present still today, denying that is denying the truth.

hate_speech: It's still stealing in my book since they will hire only other immigrants.
counter_narrative: This is not true. Anyone can be hired if they met the right criteria, and this includes immigrants who have a right to be and work here.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants take our jobs, and our country is in danger because we let them.
CN: Most immigrants are here legally and work for their families. It is necessary to accept people from every country instead of leaving out people in need because of their nationality.
HS: If we accept everyone we won't have jobs anymore since immigrants steal ours
CN: But many immigrants have started their own companies: it's the opposite of stealing jobs.

hate_speech: This doesn't change the fact that gays are perverts.
counter_narrative: Why do you think it is a crime to be gay? It is a societal disorder to target gays.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are just sick. It is an abomination
CN: Do you consider it a disease like cold or flu?
HS: Yes, gays are sick.
CN: I don't see what help could come of saying it. Rather, I think it would help to have a discussion about gender expression and people's individual merits.

hate_speech: Muslims are just an inconvenient group of people in a country like the UK. They cannot be integrated.
counter_narrative: Muslims are welcome here, and many of them already live here, so why shouldn't we welcome them? Why should we be so intolerant of people who are already integrated here?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are not welcome in our country and Islam should be banned.
CN: People are free to choose their own religion, and to practice it as they wish.

hate_speech: I am trying to say that black people are a different race from us. We need to stop trying to keep the negroes from poisoning our society, and feminism helps them do that.
counter_narrative: Feminists are capable of recognizing the humanity of a diverse society. To say that some people don't deserve to be in our society is wrong.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is about the destruction of manhood, and the disempowerment of white man.
