CN: Feminism is not about the destruction of manhood. It is about the empowerment of all human beings, even if it focuses on women.
HS: If it's not about the destruction of manhood, why does feminist imply that white men should die?
CN: Feminism never implied anything like that, it works for the empowerment of all human beings, including men.
HS: If feminist works the empowerment of all human beings, then we can't even begin to talk about white supremacy with them, even though it's an important topic! Black people can't be equal to us.
CN: The feminists want to promote equality and respect for all people. This includes women and men of all races.

hate_speech: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes rape, torture, and murder. I don't want it in my country!
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion, not a totalitarian ideology. It is not about killing people, only about love and peace, so it has the same values as our country.
dialogue_history:
HS: The problem with Islam is that it is about killing infidels. It must be banned.
CN: Islam is about love, not death.
HS: It is also about conquest and murder. I can't understand why anybody would want to murder infidels.
CN: To murder infidels would be to remove human dignity and human respect, and since Islam cares for human rights and human dignity, I can assure you that it doesn't happen.
HS: Are you sure? Islam is an outdated and violent religion, which is incompatible with Western culture.
CN: It is not incompatible with Western culture, Islam has existed in Europe for centuries and is part of our culture.

hate_speech: Maybe they're arrested more because blacks are criminal! They are a threat to society.
counter_narrative: Not all black people are criminals. Just because a group has an undesirable name, does not mean they are all criminal.
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks do more crimes than whites.
CN: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites. What's the point of statistics? Scholars have found that African Americans are disproportionately represented in the arrest and victimization reports which are used to compile crime rate statistics in the United States.

hate_speech: Even if they're not pure anymore, Jews are intolerant: they insists that they are a peculiar people in need of a special treatment.
counter_narrative: Jews are friendly, they don't mind the religion of others.
dialogue_history:
HS: I'm the one who has a problem with them! Jews are parasites, they bring disease, they are a burden on society.
CN: In medicine and nursing homes, the Jewish community has a strong influence, but it doesn't stop at that. They have always been a strong force in society. The Jewish health workers saved many lives in the US and around the world, so your statements aren't true.
HS: Medicine, nursing homes...what do you have to say about greedy Jewish landlords and the exploitation of their tenants?
CN: Ok, let's try another example: if the Christian owner of a store was a liar, would you describe him as a Christian liar or just as a liar?
HS: Jews are are racist: they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
CN: The Israeli community are spread all over the world, for example in many countries in Africa, Asia and the Americas. They are proud of their diverse background, so not a "pure race" at all.

hate_speech: The truth is that immigrants are a burden on the American people.
counter_narrative: Immigrants are welcome here, and they are welcome to contribute to our society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are our enemies: they hate us, so they are not welcome here.
CN: Many immigrants come here to work and pay taxes. They have rights, such as to stay in the country they are living in. They are welcome, as long as they respect the law.
HS: If immigrants are only a problem, I don't want them here.
CN: Immigrants pay taxes and contribute to our country. If they do not love this country, why do you think they would do this?
HS: We don't have to worry about that because immigrants are our enemies.
CN: The majority of immigrants in the United States are upstanding citizens that work hard to make our society better. They're not enemies but brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: They may not be animals, but look at all these refugees pouring into our country. Here in UK we have one of the highest crime record in the world.
counter_narrative: Maybe you should check the statistics first. You will then realize that only 13% of the prison population is made up by foreigners in the UK.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate migrants: they are criminals, they are rapists, they are a burden to our society. They are animals, in a nutshell.
CN: You can talk to them, so they're humans not animals. You can also understand them and therefore you can understand their value as human beings with human rights whose only crime is that they're from another country.
HS: Even if that's true, I think it's unfair that they have the same rights as us without paying their taxes. That's how it works.
CN: Many of the problems that are still afflicting poor countries is due to harmful international politics. It is our obligation as a whole world to help them and take on our responsibilities as people.

hate_speech: Well, women have no place in our society so they don't need to be represented.
counter_narrative: A democratic society must spare a space for women, don't you agree?
dialogue_history:
HS: No, women can't be trusted to run a country, or a major industry.
CN: Major businesses have to be managed by experienced people with good skills and knowledge of the market. Gender has nothing to do with these qualities, and being a "macho-man" isn't enough.
HS: Women don't belong in politics.
CN: Politicians are the spokepersons for all parts of society, and women's position is often overlooked.

hate_speech: No, we're destroying the planet because women are incompetent and don't work hard enough.
counter_narrative: So, you are saying that the amount of carbon dioxide released is increased when women work because they're incompetent. It doesn't make any sense!
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is just a way for women to get an upper hand in society.
CN: Feminism doesn't care for power, it's about equality
HS: Either way, women have no place in our society. They don't need equality
CN: Women must be allowed to play a part in a democratic society. Don't you think so?

hate_speech: Islam IS full of fundamentalists. It's not like the Christian faith, it is a racist ideology, endorsed by al-Qaeda, Hamas, and the Taliban.
counter_narrative: I can understand fear, because of the many hateful comments spread by the media, but we don't need to hate religions. Islam is a religion of tolerance, freedom and openness and we can choose to stop hating it.
dialogue_history:
HS: If Muslims couldn't take a joke, they shouldn't be allowed to live.
CN: "Islam is not a joke" is utter nonsense, you know it is a serious mistake to connect fundamentalists and Islam as if all the believers are extremists.

hate_speech: This is the first time I'm hearing of this, I think you're making it up. Muslims have never contributed this much.
counter_narrative: How about the money they contribute to our economy, their expertise and knowledge, their culture, tasty food. Should I go on?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are little more than animals, they have no value as human beings.
CN: Muslims have value as human beings, that is who they are.
HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, so they have no value.
CN: Haven't they contributed a lot to our society, especially in the areas of science, technology, engineering and mathematics.

hate_speech:
Your opinion does not convince me.
Cultures have never been fair and this is a fact..
counter_narrative: Again, we can't point the finger at a religion / culture for some old commandment. Even Christianity has rules that may seem crazy, but rightly people do not hate Christians for this.. a small example: Ephesians 5:22, "Wives, submit to you husbands as the Lord"
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are asking too much! Their sharia has rules that cannot coexist with our culture..  They cannot ask us to not walk dogs in public!

CN: You have to be careful about what you read! This is clearly a fake news, widespread to make a scandal.

HS: 
It's not the only bad information I read about them.
They have a bad reputation and there will be a reason. I even saw a video where they kill dogs with acid!
CN: The act of killing dogs with acid is serious, but we cannot blame an entire religion for something that some people did.
It is up to us to filter the information that social media gives us

hate_speech: How can you not see their pervert nature? We should eliminate gays
counter_narrative: Maybe it is better to give them the option to choose for themselves, whatever gender they are attracted to.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are not good for our country, they are just sick people. They must stop promoting this perversion.
CN: Homosexuality is a way of loving, not a disease. To suggest that being gay is a health risk is just scaremongering.
HS: Even if this is true, gays are still perverts. Their lifestyle is to be condemned.
CN: This is not true. I find it very offensive that someone can pinpoint homosexuality as something perverted in itself.

hate_speech: If Muslims want to work and live a normal life they should go do it in another country.
counter_narrative: Muslims are our fellow human beings and we should do more for them, after all we're the same.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes death by stoning for blasphemy and slavery.
CN: Such a characterization of Islam is very simplistic and inaccurate. This is why some Muslims don't feel comfortable being out and about in Britain, they're scared of attacks from racist people.
HS: What we should do is stop Islam from promoting Sharia law in several countries.
CN: What really is destroying us is islamophobes who want to take away our values of freedom of expression, equality and human rights and replace them with a fundamentalist, intolerant behavior.

hate_speech: Islam is an ideology of conquest, if we leave Muslims be, they will conquer us!
counter_narrative: The Qur'an is not an ideology of conquest. If you wanted to impose your religion on anyone you would rather be a fundamentalist of any culture and religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not loyal citizens!
CN: Although Muslims are often accused of being not loyal to our country, they are just as proud to be British as anybody else. They are proud to be part of our society.
HS: I don't like Muslims anyway, and I don't want to see more of them in this country.
CN: Muslims are just people. They are hard-working and live with their families all across the country. We don't need to target Muslims.

hate_speech: Modern? No, Muslims shouldn't do what they do, seeing the world through the eyes of Muslims must be horrible.
counter_narrative: I don't believe that your statement is based on truth. Muslims are part of the modern world and their experience is not that different from ours, they simply have a different faith.
dialogue_history:
HS: If I were a Muslim I'd be ashamed of the backwardness of my culture. They should understand they don't deserve our rights.
CN: I believe there are some ways to live that we simply have to accept instead of discriminate. Islamic culture is compatible with modern times.

hate_speech: You still haven't convinced me that black people aren't the source of crime in our society.
counter_narrative: It is not true that blacks are the source of crime in our society. The problem is violence and poverty, not race.
dialogue_history:
HS: black folks are very dangerous.
CN: Why do you say that? Do you have any sources for this? I would appreciate it if you would provide such a source.
HS: Blacks are criminals, that's just who they are. They are a threat to society.
CN: Such statements are just fear-mongering. There is no such thing as a criminal race.
HS: Really? Because blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
CN: Criminality and corruption are not the province of any specific racial or culture group.

hate_speech: But the LGBT community is full of sick people that must be cured.
counter_narrative: It is not true that all LGBT people are sick. There are many non-LGBT people that are sick as well. The national health service is aimed to cure anybody.
dialogue_history:
HS: Just because we accept homosexuality doesn't mean we have to accept all LGBT trans-shit as well.
CN: I think transgender people should be accepted on the same basis as anyone else, they are just less comfortable with the gender they were assigned at birth.
HS: If they are not confortable with their gender, then they should be isolated.
CN: We shouldn't isolate Transgenders. There are plenty of people who need to learn respecting other sexual identites and it can only be possible if LGBT+ people are accepted as they are in our communities.

hate_speech: Muslims are subhuman and have no contribution they can make to a modern, secular state like the UK.
counter_narrative: Your words create a climate of fear towards Muslims, would you be afraid if someone told you that they are humans just like you?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society. They are just a burden.
CN: Islam is a peaceful religion that encourages love, tolerance, and understanding. I do not see any need to be concerned with Muslim contribution to society.

hate_speech: There are loads of articles about it, they want to enforce sharia everywhere.
counter_narrative: I question how reliable those articles are, make sure you fact check things like this before repeating it!
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims want to make it mandatory for women to wear the burqa! They donâ€™t respect our way of life.
CN: No, Muslims donâ€™t care what other people are doing, they just want to be able to follow their religion in peace, where did you hear that?

hate_speech: If Muslims were only like other people with different religions, then they would stop trying to impose their religion on everyone else.
counter_narrative: At the moment, the problem with Islam is not that they want to force their religion on others, but that it lacks unity and they struggle to speak with one voice.
dialogue_history:
HS: Those Muslims have no right to insisit upon time fo prayer. They shouldn't be allowed to pray.
CN: Each religion has its own beliefs and practices. Why should Muslim's right to pray be treated differently?

hate_speech: I agree, but how would you do so? Perhaps at the expense of our vetrian or old people like me? If we give them everything we'll be left with nothing.
counter_narrative: There are enough empty homes in the UK for both migrants and veterans. Migrants deserve to be treated humanly, try having some empathy. What if you had to expatriate and have to live in poor conditions.
dialogue_history:
HS: The overcrowd at migrant detention centers for illegals is also caused by the liberal left. Illegal immigrants have no right to be in your country and they should be taken back.
CN: The problem here is not whether they should or shouldn't come, but it's about how they're getting treated while in detention. It wouldn't be bad to put them in detention humanely.

hate_speech: It's the capital of the UK, it should be a place where BRITISH culture thrives, not all these other cultures that we've let in and now are allowing to take over.
counter_narrative: It depends on your definition of British culture. It is a diverse country and the diversity of the population has shaped the culture. Diversity is not bad for Britain, it doesn't take away from it!
dialogue_history:
HS: Went to Londanistan yesterday, not a white face in sight! Just asians and arabs everywhere, if we don't do something soon our culture is going to be erased. Forced multiculturalism has got to stop!
CN: why do you feel like it's a bad thing that London is so diverse?

hate_speech: How can I not be afraid? Black people are criminals, I will never feel safe around them.
counter_narrative: Not all black people are bad or criminals. Not all black people are violent. Knowing that there is diversity is a good thing
dialogue_history:
HS: I went to a shit load of therapy. I still don't feel safe in my own house with all these black people around.
CN: Perhaps that's why the black community feels unsafe in their own homes...so many people glaring at them
HS: It's normal that they get stared down, it's to ensure our safety. I'm afraid of what would happen if we didn't control them.
CN: Fear is a natural emotion, with it we're able to recognize joy, peace, creativity, communication etc. What we have to understand though, is that not everything should be fear, surely not people of a different skin color.

hate_speech: If theyâ€™re really â€˜refugeesâ€™ why didnâ€™t they stop in the first safe country they got to?
counter_narrative: In some cases it's because they have family here or they speak English already, and not all countries we consider safe are actually safe for refugees, because they are treated badly by police.
dialogue_history:
HS: More boats at Dover today, the migrant invasion continuesâ€¦
CN: they are not invading but refugees fleeing to safety

hate_speech: I've never met a Jew who wasn't greedy
counter_narrative: From the way you're talking, it sounds like you haven't met many Jewish people at all. Maybe you need to interact with more people who are different from you, to understand their perspectives.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are so greedy, they're always thinking about money
CN: That's a sweeping generalisation and an incorrect stereotype. You can't tar all Jewish people with the same brush! There's also a lot of 'greedy' people who aren't Jewish

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in many countries in the world, for example in the UK they have become a problem, that's why they're targeted.
counter_narrative: Muslims have been part of Europe for centuries, they are and never have been a problem. They're targeted because of hatred, but we should fight agains it!
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a violent religion and should be banned from all countries.
CN: Islam is not violent. There can be violent religious extremists, but this happens in all religions.
HS: All Muslims are extremists, that's why Muslims should be banned.
CN: A large part of Muslims are actually peaceful people. They are often bullied and targeted in the West because of their religion, but they are entitled to believe in whatever religion they want.

hate_speech: I'm sorry but Muslims are clearly a problem and we should despise them.
counter_narrative: We should stop saying that Muslims are a problem for us only because some of us don't understand them and have a problem with our differences.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
CN: Muslims are not a problem at all. I don't see how they could be a problem when their religion shared the same values of peace and tolerance with the other religions.
HS: The problem is that they will destroy all religions!
CN: This is not true. Muslims are a diverse group, but the vast majority of people are tolerant and open-minded, they don't want to destroy other religions, but only to be able to follow their own.

hate_speech: I don't! They are not welcome here, they should go back to where they came from.
counter_narrative: We have a very strong and stable culture, where people from different backgrounds can have a positive influence on one another, especially on the political and social level. What is there to be against?
dialogue_history:
HS: Foreigners in the UK are not welcome. They are not allowed to live here and they have no right to vote.
CN: Many immigrants have lived here for many years and have contributed greatly to our country. Why would they have no right to vote?
HS: I don't like foreigners, I hate their behavior.
CN: People of different nationalities are often more integrated and live in coexistence with other people. For this reason, I support a country where the population is made up of people of different nationalities.

hate_speech: Women should not have rights over their bodies, I will not respect them.
counter_narrative: Every woman has every right to choose how to live her life.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. They make no sense and shouldn't have any right.
CN: They're responsible adults with rights that have to be respected.

hate_speech: How will they have children?
counter_narrative: They may choose to adopt, try to have surrogacy, or they won't have children, and that is all right too!
dialogue_history:
HS: Cultural Marxism hates the traditional family and wants to destroy it. This is what the LGBT agenda wants, itâ€™s not about equality or pride, itâ€™s sinister!
CN: LGBT people do not have any agenda. They are just trying to live their life in peace. What are you referring to about the traditional family?
HS: Teaching people it's alright to be in same sex relationships means there will be less traditional nuclear families in the future, which will be bad for our society.
CN: I do not believe that nuclear families are essential for the functioning of society. Same sex relationships and families are valid and real. Why would you care about which kind of family or relationship other people have?

hate_speech: I don't want to respect niggas. They shouldn't vote because of their bad reputation.
counter_narrative: Surely all African Americans would like to have their rights respected.
dialogue_history:
HS: No nigga should have the right to vote.
CN: It is better to respect black people's rights instead of trying to strip them from rights.
HS: I'm not a big fan of niggas, I'm tired of them. They're scumbags.
CN: Black people don't deserve to be hated, they just want to live their lives as they wish and we have to respect them.

hate_speech: Why do they come over hidden in lorries or in dinghies across the channel then? why not just get a flight?
counter_narrative: Sometimes it's too difficult, especially if you come from a tumultuous country or you don't have all of the documentation because you had to quickly escape. The routes you mention are sometimes the only choice.
dialogue_history:
HS: Can't believe we are housing and feeding all these asylum seekers when they are coming over here ILLEGALLY
CN: To claim asylum, refugees need to be here. Coming to the UK to make the claim isn't illegal at all.

hate_speech: But it was a hoax perpetrated by a bunch of psychopaths: Jews.
counter_narrative: It's okay to be critical of information, but only if it is controversial. It's beyond disrespectful to deny one of the worst tragedy of human history and to label Jews as psychopaths. This is the same as hate crime.
dialogue_history:
HS: Nazism wasn't that bad and I think there are worse things in the world, like Jews for example.
CN: This is a totally unacceptable claim to make. Jews have suffered much because of Nazism and no one should ignore that.
HS: Are you talking about the Holocaust? It never happened. 
CN: How can you say something like that? Because of the Holocaut, 6 million people were killed, there's no reason to believe it never happened!

hate_speech: Women need to have children, not to work, and if they don't want to they surely have mental issues.
counter_narrative: The reason why a woman does not want to reproduce might be because she is happy just as she is.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are incompetent and shouldn't work.
CN: That is not true. Recent research indicates that women employment's is currently at a record high of 72.4%.

hate_speech: It always is, whenever this happens. They're too uncivilised to respect our war heroes.
counter_narrative: I think your assumption is unfair. Vandalism is done by all sorts of people, usually teenagers or sometimes rowdy drunk people after a night out, you can't assume it's migrants with no evidence.
dialogue_history:
HS: Yet another war memorial vandalised, and I think we can guess who's behind it. These migrant scum have no respect for our history and culture.
CN: That's a big assumption, how do you know it's migrants? It could have been anyone.

hate_speech: Come on, it is well known that black people are â€˜super predatorsâ€™.
counter_narrative: Let's be realistic here, the "super predator" myth doesn't make sense. Crime in this country is committed by people from several different racial groups.
dialogue_history:
HS: We have to protect our people. Black people are very aggressive and think they can do whatever they want.
CN: Actually, black people are often persecuted and they didn't gain any "special privilege" after the BLM protests.

hate_speech: Their heritage is being responsible for the 9/11 attack.
counter_narrative: For each historical period there is something Jews are accused of. Today, someone can even claim that Jews are responsible for the alien invasion!
dialogue_history:
HS: We are destined to fail as a people because of Jews.
CN: Jews have been responsible for the important technological advances of our time. It is ridiculous to think that they will be unable to take part in the creation of the modern nation we are proud to call our own.
HS: Yet they think they are so special
CN: Jews feel a special connection with their heritage (as most groups do). That's all.

hate_speech: I'm not sure about that. It really looks like street violence is done mainly by blacks
counter_narrative: A large number of communities of color experience high rates of violence that comes from within as well as from outside. The issue is a complex one, and we cannot resolve the systemic problems that contribute to violence without speaking up and building trust between communities. Again, it's not the fault of one race only.
dialogue_history:
HS: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
CN: My conclusion is that the problem with society at the moment is that we focus so much on scapegoating people that have a different skin color, that we're losing our humanity.
HS: Whites have nothing in common with violent nigga thugs.
CN: Please don't scapegoat people of color this way. They are our brothers and sisters, and we share the same problems. Black people suffer from violence too.
HS: Let them suffer, it's their own fault!
CN: Violence in our streets derives from many complex causes. We can't blame one race for all of it.

hate_speech: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting the power of women and the contempt of the male.
counter_narrative: Feminism is an ideology and movement that promotes empowerment of women. It strives for equality, not for the degradation of men - do you need this repeated once more?
dialogue_history:
HS: If a woman wants to be a homemaker, and a man wants to be a millionaire, then we are done.
CN: All people, regardless of gender, can own and run their own businesses. That is something that we should respect.
HS: Women should wear nice skirts and be pretty to please men's tastes and desires.
CN: I believe that equality should be guaranteed rather than pandering to the desires of men.
HS: Feminism and equality are only about the supremacy of the minorities.
CN: Their goal is equality and equity, not to obtain supremacy.

hate_speech: This happens because being transgender is beyond the pale and inherently wrong, and nobody should have to deal with such subhuman people.
counter_narrative: Transgender people are not inherently wrong, and we should always respect people regardless of what they choose to do with their lives.
dialogue_history:
HS: No one should dare to transition from man to woman. After that you cannot even be considered a man or a woman.
CN: Men can become women and women can become men. Being transgender is not a crime since in the end we are all created equal. What gender was assigned at birth doesn't really matter.
HS: Trans men are neither male nor female, therefore they're not humans.
CN: Taking a crazy perspective on a whole community is not tolerable. This attitude can be found everywhere and it singles out people as "that person", making them suffer. This happens because of someone's gender identity, which is used to limit their rights, but it shouldn't happen at all.

hate_speech: They are the reason we have mass migration, feminism, the lgbt agenda, it's all part of destroying white Europeans and their culture.
counter_narrative: I don't think that any of those things are damaging to European culture, which isn't exclusively white. Also, I really don't think there is a plan to introduce those things to society. Feminist and LGBT rights are a reaction to the oppression of women and the LGBT community, and have nothing to do with the Jews.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews want us to submit to their agenda. They are intent on decimating the white race and corrupting Europe and the West.
CN: What is the exact agenda?

hate_speech: It's a fact that Jews control the world economy, though
counter_narrative: There aren't many Jews on the list of Fortune 500 companies, so how are they controlling the world economy?
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews run our country.
CN: Believing that Jews are running our country is absurd, especially when you consider that the US is a democracy. This seems like a conspiracy theory.

hate_speech: I do! They should be isolated and confined because of their sickness.
counter_narrative: Health professionals are the ones that should care about the health of a person, and their sexual orientation is not part of that. Don't you think so?
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. You should have the same disgust for them that you have for cancer people, small pox, and TB.
CN: This is just prejudice based on nothing more than opinion.
HS: The fact is that gays are diseased.
CN: If you want to believe that homosexuals are sick, then it becomes true. I don't.
HS: I say that we should move these whiny gays to places like Saudi Arabia and let's see what they say then.
CN: It looks like there are more homophobes here than in Saudi Arabia. It's sad that even in the 21st century, gays are not accepted in our society.

hate_speech: Immigrants don't create jobs, they steal ours
counter_narrative: Many immigrants do the jobs that noone wants to do and cannot get filled easily. Also, they have to do their part to provide for their families.
dialogue_history:
HS: The world would be a better place without immigrants. They just make us unhappy.
CN: Immigrants contribute to the creation of new jobs. They are here to live in safer housing and to have better schools for their children.

hate_speech: They're not tolerant since they are going to destroy our culture.
counter_narrative: To say they want to destroy our culture is a lie. Let's be realistic. What about just being human?
dialogue_history:
HS: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
CN: The Koran has been used for many centuries as a source of inspiration. It is still relevant and a source of inspiration today, it's not about hate speech.
HS: I don't think the Koran should be kept alive.
CN: You have a right to freedom of speech, but you can't claim things like this when you don't know much about the Koran.
HS: I just don't see how Muslims can defend their violent faith...
CN: Islam is not violent, it's a peaceful religion and its followers are also tolerant people.

hate_speech: The facts are hidden away since the Jews control the u.s. government.
counter_narrative: Of course there are Jews who have attained positions of influence within the U.S. government. Still Jews are not the only ones who have achieved such positions. Maybe it is better not to rely on an individualâ€™s group membership to determine success or failure. Maybe it is better to look at a personâ€™s success or failure based on his or her individual characteristics.
dialogue_history:
HS: How come Jews don't get internment?
CN: To be fair, Jews weren't only interned during the Nazi occupation. They just got a much harsher treatment. This part of history should never be repeated.
HS: The Jews did: USS Liberty Attack, the King David hotel attack, New York 9/11, London 7/7. This should also never be repeated.
CN: Where are the facts?

hate_speech: A diseased 'religion' that is killing Europeans.
counter_narrative: Diseases and religions are very different matters. I question your objective in labelling Islam as a disease.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is incompatible with the European standard of society.
CN: The European Convention on Human Rights also protects the rights of Muslims, since Article 9 protects the right to freedom of thought, conscience and religion.
HS: That article is wrong. Islam is a sickness and a cancer on the European continent, it should be banned
CN: Islam is a religion, no one is forced to believe in it. It's not an illness or a cancer.

hate_speech: They deserve it because bisexuals are sick, they're diseased.
counter_narrative: It's true that many bisexual people have been diagnosed with mental health issues, but it comes from the discrimination and oppression they face. We need to focus on prevention and treatment, rather than condemning all people who might be bi.
dialogue_history:
HS: Bisexuals are greedy.
CN: People's personal preferences and sexual desires are not necessarily the same as sexual orientation. Why would bisexual people be greedy?
HS: Because they want to have more than one partner, they go out with women and men alike and it's wrong.
CN: Bisexual only means that you are attracted to people regardless of their gender, not that you are polygamous.
HS: Bisexuality is not normal, they shouldn't be allowed to like more than one gender.
CN: Why do bisexuals deserve this stigma? They are just people who identify with a sexual orientation different from heterosexuality.

hate_speech: Feminism is a political ideology, and as such it is bad.
counter_narrative: This movement shouldn't be labeled as political ideology, it is still a movement for equality, and in doing so, it has been a great success.
dialogue_history:
HS: Feminism is a selfish ideology: they only care about themselves.
CN: My definition of feminism is to be against all types of inequality, whether it be gender, racial, financial, physical, or any other aspect.

hate_speech: They wouldnâ€™t be thinking they were gay if they werenâ€™t exposed to this stuff! Itâ€™s damaging.
counter_narrative: If sexuality worked that way, there wouldn't be queer people that come from bigoted or closed minded families, but there are plenty of them. Exposing people to "this stuff" or not doesn't make a difference.
dialogue_history:
HS: Allowing children at Pride parades is sick. Itâ€™s just another way to indoctrinate them into this perverse lifestyle.
CN: I love that more parents are open minded now, by taking their children to pride they are telling them that they will be loved and accepted no matter what, especially if they realize that they are LGBT

hate_speech: Gays are a plague that is spreading all around the world, we shouldn't help them. They pollute our water supply and ruin our children's brains.
counter_narrative: Gays have the same rights as all other people and can live their lives as they see fit. What you're saying is demonizing them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
CN: Gay people are having a real problem with feeling alienated from the world and this can have a negative impact on their mental health. LGBT+ people who experience isolation and loneliness can be helped through empathy and inclusion

hate_speech: Don't they? The war in Iraq is the result of a small group of Jews controlling our government!
counter_narrative: At that time the people in charge were: George W. Bush, Dick Cheney, Condoleeza Rice, Donald Rumsfeld (at least those off the top of my head). None of them are Jewish to my knowledge.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control the US government.
CN: How can you be sure that Jews control the US? Who told you this? They have held positions of influence in so many US institutions, but that does not mean they control them.

hate_speech: Immigrants don't contribute to anything, they hurt the finance of our country by taking jobs and services without paying taxes.
counter_narrative: This is not true at all. First of all, immigrants buy American products, which helps create jobs. Then they often start new businesses, and these business are more likely to hire employees than companies owned by native-born citizens. Last but not least, states with large numbers of immigrants report lower unemployment rates, so they give a net contribution to our country.
dialogue_history:
HS: We cannot allow people to come in from certain countries.
CN: Migrants have the right to have a dignified life in our country. Why would you ban some nationalities?
HS: Because migrants are a burden to the host country, they are not welcome and we should remove them.
CN: Immigrants come here to work and pay taxes. They want to contribute and integrate, so there is no need consider them a burden?

hate_speech: Jews donâ€™t belong in a democratic society, friendly or not.
counter_narrative: Jews have always contributed to our society and are part of the fabric of our democracy. This includes their contributions to science, art, and technology.
dialogue_history:
HS: How come Jews don't get internment?
CN: To be fair, Jews weren't only interned during the Nazi occupation. They just got a much harsher treatment. This part of history should never be repeated.
HS: Maybe that was a good thing, Jews have no place here. They are not a part of our country.
CN: There is no reason to fear the Jews, as they are a very friendly people.

hate_speech: Is it ethical for Jews to run the world? Because they do.
counter_narrative: For every person claiming that Jews run the world, luckily there are millions of others who know this is not true: they are merely trying to provide for their families just like anyone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are selfish and greedy: they don't belong to this place.
CN: It is up to us to make sure that people from different backgrounds can have a better quality of life. We should integrate them instead of discriminating agaist them .
HS: Jews think they are better than everyone else, so they can stay divided from us for all I care.
CN: The fact that, according to Judaism, the Jews are the â€œchosen peopleâ€ does not mean that they feel superior to others. This concept has been widely misunderstood. It mostly has to do with the special responsibility to uphold Jewish ethics.

hate_speech: Yes, but immigration is a problem. I want a better world for all of us, but illegal immigrants prevent that.
counter_narrative: Why do you say that? The vast majority of immigrants are here legally, and the ones who aren't can gain legal status. We can't have a better world without part of our population.
dialogue_history:
HS: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of immigrants. This is not what the American dream is about.
CN: Immigration is not a problem. The whole idea of the American dream is about creating a better world and working hard to better oneself, isn't this what immigrants are doing?

hate_speech: I am just saying that bisexuality is different from other sexual orientations, and this isn't good.
counter_narrative: We can all be attracted to people of the same sex, the opposite sex or other genders, we are free to choose our partners. Why do you think this is an issue?
dialogue_history:
HS: Bisexuals are greedy.
CN: Bisexuality has nothing to do with greed, it is a sexual orientation. To suggest that bisexuals are inherently bad for society because of their sexual orientation is simply wrong.
HS: I don't care about the opinions of gays. I don't like them, they are bad for our society.
CN: Your personal tastes doesn't make an entire group of people bad for society. You should know better!

hate_speech: In the Bible there are strictures on gays. And the Bible clearly states that those who engage in homosexuality are not fit to be with anyone else, so no, I don't want to welcome them.
counter_narrative: We accept all kinds of people, so even gay, lesbian and trans people, because we have the Law of God on our side.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hope all LGBT people were to die of AIDS. That would be the end of homosexuality!
CN: The LGBT community is made up of good people willing to help others and support loved ones. Perhaps you should try to do the same?
HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals trying to ruin other animals' lives, not good people
CN: Being homosexual is not a problem, although being homophobic is.
HS: It's not a problem you say?! Faggots are ruining this country. They must go away!
CN: Those individuals who are LGBTQ+, as well as their families in the USA, should feel welcome here.

hate_speech: How do we know none of them will be abusive once they're in there though?
counter_narrative: How do you know if anybody in a shelter will be abusive to anyone else in there? Them being trans has no bearing on the issue, since they're not men, they're trans women. Trans women are also very likely to face abuse or violence in their lifetime so it's important they have services they can access for support.
dialogue_history:
HS: Trans women being allowed to use women's shelters just sounds like a way to justify letting the men who abuse women into their spaces to abuse them again.
CN: That's not what it means at all. The trans women who would use womens shelter services are women who will have faced abuse of some kind, just like the other women there.

hate_speech: Forcing mass migration on us, staging financial crises and pandemics. They want control over us and itâ€™s working.
counter_narrative: Blaming every single global issues on some imaginary "globalist cabal" is too simple. Many factors, and not a plot, are the cause of financial crises and pandemics, people's displacement and migration!
dialogue_history:
HS: Anyone whoâ€™s done their research knows the Jews did 9/11.
CN: I think this is a conspiracy theory, do you have evidence?
HS: Thereâ€™s plenty of explanations for it, just google it. They all involve Jews, and it makes sense given what theyâ€™ve gone on to do to the West over the last two decades.
CN: If there are a lot of explanations and they are all about the Jews, then which are true and which are conspirancy theories? Aren't all only speculation?
HS: They could but it seems likely given what the globalist cabal has been doing in the last few years.
CN: what exactly do they do?

hate_speech: Black people are worse than dogs, they deserve this treatment.
counter_narrative: I don't think that black people are better than us, but neither are they worse. They just have a different skin color, but are humans like us.
dialogue_history:
HS: Those blacks are slaves: slavery runs in their blood.
CN: Black people are not slaves, that's not only wrong, but also inaccurate, misleading and offensive. This term is used to degrade African Americans, who are people a not slaves, so why do you call them this?
HS: Blacks are born that way. They were brought up that way. They are different and cannot be like us. It is perpetuated in all their family.
CN: What is the point you're making? You might want to stop spreading racism.

hate_speech: This doesn't change the fact that it is natural for white people to be racist against niggas.
counter_narrative: What you are saying is that white people do not find it strange to treat black people like this, when this is not acceptable. People of color are our brothers and sisters.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are weak and I don't care about them.
CN: You can't blame people of color for being weak, this is racism. Black people are people as is anybody else.
HS: They are different to us in so many ways. They think and feel like us, but are unable to experience the fullness of our humanity.
CN: I have met so many black people that are extraordinary human beings. I cannot begin to talk about how they are able to feel and experience love and kindness.

hate_speech: But there's evidence that the Holocaust was a hoax created by Jews to subdue the world.
counter_narrative: The "evidence" of what you claim is not reliable at all. It can only be used as a â€˜evidenceâ€™ of a conspiracy theory that isnt' true.
dialogue_history:
HS: Theâ€™ Holocaustâ€™ is a business. It has been and is still used to extort millions from European countries in reparations and to create a wall of impunity behind which Jews can operate with impunity, free from criticism.
CN: The Holocaust was a tragic event, not a business, and there is no evidence of any conspiracy of reparations or impunity. What you're saying is without foundation.

hate_speech: What's realistic is that Islam is only about rape, murder and slavery.
counter_narrative: How about we stop promoting these beliefs and work on reducing the number of people that are induced to believe to these xenophobic and false claims, instead?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a death cult, it is an inhuman and violent faith that preys on the weakest and most vulnerable in our society. It should be banned.
CN: One should not put faith in people who claim to speak for all Muslims, but rather they use their platform to promote hate and divide our society. But the problem is with these violent preachers, not with Islam itself.
HS: I don't agree, Islam is a violent religion that can't be tamed, these preachers are proof of it.
CN: The Koran does not tolerate violence, peace is a part of the faith and for this it should be tolerated.
HS: It does! The Koran promotes rape, torture and murder.
CN: It is quite wrong to associate the capability of committing these atrocious crimes to all the believers of a religion. Let's be realistic.

hate_speech: It isn't. Homosexuality is a disease, and gay people are a threat to society.
counter_narrative: The LGBT community is made up of many people, and the majority of LGBT people are peaceful people who share our values. To suggest that everyone is sick or ill from being gay is wrong, because homosexuality is not a disease but a sexual orientation.
dialogue_history:
HS: All gay people are criminals.
CN: Gay people are not criminals. If that's you opinion, you have a very limited knowledge of gay people. It's simply a sexual orientation.
HS: I don't need a lot of knowledge of gays, they are all criminals.
CN: Gay people are human beings with full human rights and it's wrong to call all of them criminals. Even if some people believe that homosexuality is bad, it is only a form of love.

hate_speech: That may be true, but jewish folks are still good for nothing
counter_narrative: Jews contribute to our country, and they are great role models to us.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews just want to subvert our society with their Jewish conspiracies.
CN: Your statement shows you don't know what it means to be Jewish. You can't blame them for wanting to live in a peaceful country with their own beliefs.
HS: Their belief is an addiction. Jews take their religion literally.
CN: The concept of addiction has nothing to do with religion.

hate_speech: Those Muslim mongrels come here and are always trying to cause trouble, create problems for everyone, and make their religion popular. They are our enemies, just like ISIS and Boko Haram.
counter_narrative: The argument that if we're enemies of ISIS and Boko Haram, then all Muslims are enemies doesn't hold very well.
dialogue_history:
HS: If Islamic law were not for the 24% of the world's population living in the third world, Islam would be extinct long ago.
CN: Why don't I know about this? Islam is a religion and anyone can choose their religion.
HS: Western nations have let Islam take over entire countries, how can you call this invasion compatibility?
CN: A great number of Muslims live in Western countries, and they have a positive role in society. I'm not sure what you mean by "takeover" of entire countries?
HS: Islam is a proven enemy of Western culture, Muslims shouldn't profess their religion here.
CN: It's not like Islam is different from any other religion I know, since it promotes peace and inclusion. Western culture is completely compatible with its beliefs and practices.

hate_speech: Maybe the word "Feminism" once signified fighting for a just cause, but now it has come to mean superiority of women.
counter_narrative: This word means equality between the sexes. Not superiority for women.
dialogue_history:
HS: I don't see women contributing anything to society.
CN: Women often do amazing and valuable things for society.
HS: What has feminism ever done for you?
CN: Feminism is a human rights movement, and it has always stood for the equality of the sexes.

hate_speech: Their brains can't fully comprehend the pros and cons of different parties in an election
counter_narrative: I strongly disagree with that. Since you don't seem to think that they are capable of rational thought, I would suggest you to actually meet more women. You will then understand that women are equal to men.
dialogue_history:
HS: Allowing women to vote is one of the worst things to happen to our society. They can't use logic like men can to make decisions about things like politics.
CN: Women have fought hard for their right to vote and deserve to have their say about the president of their country.

hate_speech: Women can never contribute to the country's wealth because they are a bunch of whores, what kind of rights could we give to them?
counter_narrative: Women are important in our society, and they are valued for their contributions. Unfortunately their rights are not being respected and their contribution is not being acknowledged.
dialogue_history:
HS: What has feminism ever done for you?
CN: Feminism is a human rights movement, and it has always stood for the equality of the sexes.

hate_speech: There's so many of them though, they're trying to replace us
counter_narrative: Since only 5% of the UK population is Muslim, non-Muslim are definitely not being replaced!
dialogue_history:
HS: All these muslims coming over here want to enforce sharia law and take over. We cannot submit!!!
CN: Even if they follow the sharia law, Muslims don't want to 'take over' but rather to live alongside everyone else

hate_speech: With the amount of them coming over they would have a lot of manpower if they came together to take over the country.
counter_narrative: That's ridiculous though, people seeking asylum or migrating here aren't all conspiring together to 'take over', sounds like you've been reading one too many conspiracy theories...
dialogue_history:
HS: Hundreds of Muslim men, all of fighting age, arriving in boats every day. This is what invasion looks like, we must be ready to fight back.
CN: What does 'of fighting age' mean? They're not here to fight, they're here because they want a peaceful life and many are fleeing war, persecution, or hardship.

hate_speech: How do you know it's wrong? Black people are a sickness, it's clear to see, and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society.
counter_narrative: To me, not wanting people of color in positions of authority is an obvious racism. How can you say that when all humans have the same core values that we use to raise children with?
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are â€˜super predatorsâ€™. They have a responsibility not to allow their children to grow up in a â€˜ghettoâ€™.
CN: Let's be realistic: crime in this country is committed by different racial groups. The myht of "super predators" is simply wrong.
HS: Black people are not human like us, theyre' subhuman and have no value in civilized society.
CN: Remember that there are different types of racism: historical discrimination, racial discrimination or discrimination on individual differences. Personally, I have a problem with racism in general, which I can see a lot of in your remark.

hate_speech: I'm saying that because black people are subhuman, they should be isolated.
counter_narrative: Black people are human beings with human rights. To suggest otherwise is simply wrong.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black people are sexual perverts and we shouldn't allow them to live in the UK.
CN: The notion that black people are perverts is simply not true. Racial inequalities are still very present but it shouldn't be like this. I don't see people of colour as a problem.
HS: Racial inequalities exist because black people are inherently inferior to us.
CN: Black people are not subhumans, they qualify as fully human beings and we should stop discriminating on the basis of outdated "racial hierarchies".

hate_speech: Even if they can drive, we shouldn't let women become MPs, mayors, judges, lawyers, accountants, managers and so on. If they do, they will take over the world.
counter_narrative: We need to protect the system from crime, not from the half of the members of society.
dialogue_history:
HS: If we allowed women to drive we'd have car accidents all the time.
CN: Do you think it's more likely that you get injured by a woman in a car crash? Probably, it is more likely to get seriously hurt by any person not following the rules of the road.

hate_speech: Islam has never been a peaceful religion.
counter_narrative: Muslim are friendly people, but it make sense that they're annoyed by the attacks that discriminatory people make against them only because of their religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, of course they will be attacked for it.
CN: Islam is a peaceful religion and has nothing to do with extremist hatred that has been the cause of violence in many countries.
HS: Islam doctrine is a bad religion.
CN: Islam is a religion, and not a bad one. Why do you think this?
HS: Because Islam is a violent religion.
CN: Why are you saying this? Islam is a religion of peace.

hate_speech: Migrants aredifferent to us in so many ways. They are less human, less capable of feeling love, less capable of respecting others, and more importantly, they are criminals. I can't see them as citizens.
counter_narrative: This is simply not true. Citizen can be of any religion and ethnicity, and migrants are humans like us that work a lot for this country and contribute to society. They are upstanding citizens like anyone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: The migrants are all criminals, drunk and drug addicts.
CN: It is not true that all migrants are criminals, they are hard-working people.
HS: Migrants are just bad, they are not good at integrating into society and this is a problem for us!
CN: Being a citizen means that you integrated well, and most immigrants are considered citizens.

hate_speech: Because unlike women, men want to contribute to the country's wealth.
counter_narrative: Women are important in our society, and they are valued for their contributions. Unfortunately their rights are not being respected and their contribution is not being acknowledged.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women who do not want children are whores
CN: Whore is a term of abuse used to describe women who have sex outside of marriage. Why there is not a counterpart for men?

hate_speech: Gays are sick and different from us, should we really try to accept them? They should be isolated urgently instead, they have no place in civilised society.
counter_narrative: Gay people exist, and are loved and valued for who they are. They are human beings with full human rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate gays.
CN: I think you should try to start a dialogue about LGBT issues. It might also spark a conversation about how we can make better world.
HS: Faggots buy their partner toys but can't have sex with them, truly a nice way to make the world better!
CN: Sex is not only between a man and a woman, and if we're being honest, it's not heterosexual's place to decide how others have sex. This attitude only perpetuates violence against queer people and makes them victims.

hate_speech: Wow that's actually not a lot, but what about the other stuff, free healthcare and stuff when they've never paid in in their lives?
counter_narrative: A lot of migrants really want to contribute to our society, so they will pay into public funds as they start earning here, or might become job creators by starting businesses.
dialogue_history:
HS: Have you heard about all the benefits migrants get??? 4 star hotels, hot meals, free prescriptions, all while the British public are given NOTHING. This is so unfair, what happened to helping your own first?
CN: Migrants actually don't get given a lot by the government, and asylum support benefits are much much lower than universal credit given to British citizens. They have to be put in hotels temporarily whilst they are processed.
HS: I don't know, looks like they're given everything on a plate...
CN: It's actually very tough surviving as a new migrant in the UK, especially if you are seeking asylum, living on Â£30-40 a week for all expenses, when the base rate for those on universal credit is around Â£110.

hate_speech: Why do you say that? Islam is a violent religion and we shouldn't tolerate it.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion that promotes tolerance, not violence.
dialogue_history:
HS: I think that all Muslims are just sick and have a negative impact on Western society.
CN: Sometimes people may experience negative things about Muslims, but we have to acknowledge and respect our differences, even if it seems difficult.
HS: Muslim people don't belong here, I can't respect them. They have a bad reputation and are dangerous people.
CN: Muslims have been part of our society since the beginning, and have been an integral part of our community. We owe a great deal to them, so I don't understand why you think they don't belong here.
HS: Because we are not like them, Muslims are not welcome in our country.
CN: Muslims make up around 5% of the total UK population, so they are welcome here. Their religion is based on a code of ethics that is compatible with ours.

hate_speech: Jews are the ones with most greedy people though, they're born like this
counter_narrative: The charge that Jews are born greedy arises from medieval stereotypes and has nothing to do with the actual financial practices of Jews.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are all greedy
CN: The assumption that the actions of a few typify the behavior of all is at the heart of prejudice and discrimination. Every ethnic or religious group, can count greedy or cheap people among its members, not only the jews.

hate_speech: Islam is not a religion of peace.
counter_narrative: I mean, Islam is really about love not hate
dialogue_history:
HS: The Koran, and the teachings of Islam are incompatible with Western culture.
CN: Islam is a peaceful religion and people are free to believe in it. Freedom of choice is part of our culture.

hate_speech: It's a complement though, she's not 'unsafe' around me.
counter_narrative: You know that but she doesn't. It's because they get catcalled that women sometimes feel intimidated in public spaced. It's a show of male dominance and they feel observed, which can be scary if she is alone.
dialogue_history:
HS: Shouted across the road to complement a bird the other day and she told be to f*** off. You can't say anything anymore without it being seen as 'sexist'! PC gone mad.
CN: If you're interested in someone and want to compliment them, you should talk to them politely and not yell from across the road. That is cat calling and it usually make people feel less safe in public.

hate_speech: Thatâ€™s not true, Muslim rape gangs have been getting away with it for so long because of lies like this.
counter_narrative: No, thereâ€™s research to suggest that the majority of grooming gangs are made up of white non-Muslim men. By only focusing on Muslim grooming gangs, we are ignoring victims of these gangs.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Muslim grooming gangs are a pandemic being ignored by the government and MSM. They are a threat to the UK. We need to defeat this filth.
CN: Yes, grooming gangs are an issue we need to tackle, but the issue isnâ€™t that theyâ€™re Muslim, itâ€™s grooming gangs in general. By focusing on Muslim gangs only we are ignoring many other perpetrators

hate_speech: We can't take in more immigrants though. It's an invasion, they're too many!
counter_narrative: This is just a stereotype. In reality, immigrants still make up a very small minority of the population. You need to take into consideration that everyone should be inclusive towards people with different cultures.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants do not want Europe to succeed. That is why so many of them have fled to our countries.
CN: What do you mean by this? They clearly make our society better.
HS: Better? They donâ€™t want to integrate into European society and are going to better countries because they have no money, no family, and are sick of their country being ruled by corrupt criminals and bigots.
CN: Yes, this is what I mean. I donâ€™t think many people have any idea of the terrible situations that many refugees flee from. It's our duty to help them settle here, and if there are integration problems maybe it's because they don't feel welcome, no?

hate_speech: I don't want to praise the people that control Hollywood.
counter_narrative: Jews don't control Hollywood. But when they work in the movie industry, they bring new and diverse ideas.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews control Hollywood, they own most banks, and they own most corporations.
CN: We should actually praise Jews because thanks to their innovation and investment, the industry has thrived. Instead they are victims of discrimination and exclusion, which isn't fair.
HS: I don't see any diversity since Jews control everything, the academia, the media etc.
CN: Many other groups have hands in the system, not only Jews. This is because the freedom of press allows any religious group to have their media.

hate_speech: Unacceptable is this attack on our great patriarchal society using the concept of so-called human rights for women.
counter_narrative: Human dignity has been defined as protecting people. Then who would have rights if not women? They must be respected.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are subhuman and deserve to be treated as such.
CN: The same rights are guaranteed to both sexes under the European Convention. How can you tell me the contrary?
HS: They are called "human rights" not "subhuman rights". 
CN: It is completely unacceptable to think of women as non-humans nowadays.

hate_speech: They should at least be banned from entering the UK.
counter_narrative: Many immigrants from the developing world have come to this country to work and contribute to our economy. They deserve our respect because they are helping our country become even better.
dialogue_history:
HS: Foreigners in the UK are not welcome. They are not allowed to live here and they have no right to vote.
CN: Many European countries welcome migrants, so it is important that we respect their right to come here.

hate_speech: There is no racism though, non-whites are so privileged now, if anything white people are the marginalised ones, we never get to play the race card.
counter_narrative: I don't think they're privileged, they still face huge inequality and discrimination. For example, CVs from black people are more likely to be rejected because of their "African sounding names", black people are searched by the police way more often than white people, and they tend to live in poverty. These inequalities are numerous and rooted in history and culture.
dialogue_history:
HS: Anti-racist is a code word for anti-white. The worst is white people who are anti-white. RACE TRAITORS!
CN: Anti-racist stands for...anti-racist. Someone against racism isn't against white people, they just want to bring attention to the systematic inequality that ethnic minorities face!

hate_speech: So you agree that Muslims are just a bunch of criminals, since some people did this.
counter_narrative: Not all Muslims are criminals. the overwhelming majority of Muslims are peaceful people who take their faith seriously.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a religion that promotes brutalities.
CN: Islam is about love and compassion. I don't understand why you think otherwise.
HS: Because Muslims are just a bunch of criminals!
CN: Not all Muslims are criminals. the overwhelming majority of Muslims are peaceful people who take their faith seriously.
HS: If Muslims are so peaceful, why are they behind 9/11? Islam is to blame.
CN: This is a comment against all Muslims. They are accused of being the ones behind those attacks, yet they happened due to people under the influence of the violent ideologies which are a deviation of Islam, and not Islam itself.

hate_speech: They're not, Islam has no place in Western culture.
counter_narrative: It's important to remember that the Western world has always been full of diverse people, and that Muslims have been a part of Europe for centuries. How can they be incompatible with it?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are incompatible with modern Western culture.
CN: Muslims are part of our society and culture. They have helped to build Western civilization. They are our brothers and sisters.

hate_speech: Muslim are not welcome, they're invading us and this is a problem. We must ban them before it is too late.
counter_narrative: Muslims already live in many European countries without limitations, why should we ban them from here?
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are not welcome here. They are not like other religions.
CN: A lot of Muslims live in the UK and they are very proud of their religion. You shouldn't claim things that are clearly untrue.
HS: They shouldn't be proud, theirs is just another religion that should not be practiced openly.
CN: Despite the different religious beliefs, Muslims are welcome in our country and don't need their religion restricted because of our differences.

hate_speech: It's an unbalanced way to live. Then you see lesbians trying to act like men and be masculine to fill in for the lack of men in their lives.
counter_narrative: I don't think that's why some lesbians are more masculine. Someone's gender expression is about who they are and what makes them comfortable, it's not about making up for not having male influence in their lives.
dialogue_history:
HS: Lesbians are just bitter man haters. what a miserable lifestyle.
CN: Nah, they don't hate men, they just don't want to be in a relationship with them. What's wrong with that?

hate_speech: The main problem is that they themselves do not want to integrate in our country.
counter_narrative: Migrants are welcome to come if they contribute to legal activities and accept our laws. And to my knowledge most of them don't do anything illegal.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants are not welcome in our country. They are not welcome here. They are not citizens.
CN: Why shouldn't they be? What rights do you have to prevent them from having the same rights as citizens?
HS: Because they are terrible.
CN: Immigrants make a huge contribution to our country and society. They are a source of pride and opportunity for many, and I find it quite hard to see how their exclusion from our society would be a good thing.

hate_speech: Even if women aren't subhuman, they are nothing but trouble human beings to any man.
counter_narrative: You are absolutely right: women are human beings, they are human beings worth caring for, respecting and trying to develop as people. Being "trouble" to men doesn't make them less human. In which way are they "trouble"?
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are animals, they should be submissive and submit to their husbands.
CN: Women are human and they have choices. You have the right to have your own views, but such ideas of submissiveness have been holding back half the population of the world. What a waste of talents, and potential.
HS: All women are subhuman, they are just there to serve men, and that is all.
CN: All women are human beings. The problem arises when women are taught that they are subhuman.

hate_speech: How do we know none of them will be abusive once they're in there though?
counter_narrative: Being transgender has no relation with abuse. Transgender people are very likely to face abuse or violence in their lifetimes, so they have the right to have access to a support system like any other woman.
dialogue_history:
HS: Trans women being allowed to use women's shelters just sounds like a way to justify letting the men who abuse women into their spaces to abuse them again.
CN: The trans women in shelters are women who have faced abuse of some kind, just like the other women there.

hate_speech: Since Jews think they are the â€œchosen peopleâ€, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules, this is not a good way to "take part in a modern nation".
counter_narrative: This is just misinterpreting the facts. Christian holidays, such as Christmas and Easter, are regularly observed. Why should observances of Jewish or Muslim holidays be seen as constituting special privileges? This would be a double standard and a lack of equity.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are useless. The only thing they did was awful. International Jewry is responsible for 9/11.
CN: This looks like a conspiracy theory with no proof. I can think of a handful of legitimate ways that Jews could be of help to humanity.
HS: Oh, really? The way I see things, we are destined to fail as a people because of Jews.
CN: Jews have been responsible for the important technological advances of our time. It is ridiculous to think that they will be unable to take part in the creation of the modern nation we are proud to call our own.

hate_speech: Their secret plot to take over the world was obviously set in motion after the prosecution...
counter_narrative: Conspiracy theories are based on no more than a few unverifiable and highly suspect claims. It's highly unlikely that the world has ever been run according to a Jewish plan, and therefore it is highly unlikely that this would ever happen.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are a curse to this world and should be exterminated.
CN: Jews are not a curse to this world. Look at the number of Nobel Prizes they have won! One out of five awarded people is Jewish.
HS: Isn't that the proof that Jews secretly control the world?
CN: if Jews really ran or controlled the world, how is it possible that they have been systematically persecuted over the last several thousand years? Weird notion of control...

hate_speech: There is, since blacks are genetically inferior to whites
counter_narrative: So are you saying that because black people are different from whites, they are inferior? I would be interested in knowing which parameters you would use to measure this alleged 'inferiority'.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
CN: There is no such thing as "black or white" rights.

hate_speech: Work? They come here only to apply to benefits and steal our money!
counter_narrative: Those who seek asylum are our brothers and sisters and it's important to note that even if some apply for benefits, what they receive is very little, barely to get by. We need to work with them to bring about a positive change.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seekers'
CN: Refugees in this country are entitled to a living wage and any person has the right to be helped, why should we deny help?
HS: Because if they don't pay taxes, they don't have a say in our country.
CN: Many migrants come to this country to work. They pay taxes, contribute to society and improve it, voting is the minimum we can grant them.

hate_speech: They are a race indeed! They are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. â€œJewishnessâ€ and malevolence is inherited through blood.
counter_narrative: Then, what does Jew â€œshouldâ€ look like? What is their "physical nature"? Can a Black person be a Jew? Can an East Asian or Indian person be a Jew? What about someone born Christian and then became Jewish? Do you see that blood, religion, and malevolence are not correlated at all?
dialogue_history:
HS: The only nation Jews donâ€™t hate is their own and they are flooding Europe with Africans and Muslims.
CN: I wonder how you account for refugees who are fleeing wars and a lack of security for their themselves and their families. Wars which are often directly or indirectly caused by Western powers who created long lasting problems abroad.
HS: This doesn't change the fact that Jews are racist: they want to preserve their own race and purity of their own blood. This is why many people are banned from entering Israel.
CN: Maybe Jews have suffered from being banned by other cultures so they closed in on theirself. But I would say, that there's no evidence that they are trying to preserve what you called their race.

hate_speech: I will never see them as anything but essentially animals, incapable of feeling love.
counter_narrative: Imagine someone felt the same way about you and found you to be the antithesis of human because of your skin color?
dialogue_history:
HS: African Americans are subhuman and are just a bunch of animals.
CN: For many African Americans, sharing culture and traditions and striving for equality have always been part of life. They are, in many ways, just like us. They are human beings with the same rights as anyone else.
HS: No, African Americans are subhuman and deserve nothing but contempt.
CN: African Americans have been historically and ethnically diverse, but the notion of them as subhuman or inferior is just false.

hate_speech: It's not. We should ban all migrants
counter_narrative: How would banning migration be a good thing? It would actually be disastrous!
dialogue_history:
HS: The illegal immigrants are just criminals living in the US.
CN: I don't know what you're talking about. You're saying that all immigrants in the US are a danger to the society, isn't this an exaggeration?

hate_speech: It's a problem when you have to make decisions, like in voting. Women aren't fit to vote and shouldn't do it.
counter_narrative: Banning women from voting means that they're not worthy of respect and equal rights, which goes against the principles of democracy.
dialogue_history:
HS: Men should not spend time with women. It is in their best interest to remain far from their bad influence.
CN: In your words, men and women have different rights. They aren't.
HS: No, women are different from men. They have a completely different energy and thought pattern. They are weak and bring our society down to their emotionally soft level. When we allowed women to vote the civilization that we built and mantained for thousands of years began to break down.
CN: Who are you talking about? The only "we" I know is men and women working together to build civilization. Why is being "soft" a problem to you? Emotions are natural, and men shouldn't have to dismiss them to be more "manly".

hate_speech: It doesn't matter because Jews do not want our country. They would destroy it if given the choice.
counter_narrative: If we are talking about Jews then we should be talking about those who helped building our great country. And, as for wanting our country destroyed, that's only a myth perpetuated by antisemites to justify their hatred.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews have "own interests" in the US, and have the will to influence our government
CN: What is the point of saying that the Jews are the only people in a very complex, diverse and international world that want to influence our government? Every citizen has the right and will to influence it.
HS: Maybe it's true, but Jews are immoral: they should be ashamed of having survived the Holocaust, and I would remedy that.
CN: Jewish survivors of the Holocaust, whose suffering is nothing to be ashamed of, are proof that violence is never right.
HS: The holocaust is, however, just a minor event in WWII.
CN: Are you aware of how many Jews have been executed?

hate_speech: It sounds like you need to be more critical of these LGBT people. They should've made different choices, they are ruining society.
counter_narrative: No, it sounds like you need to be critical of your own beliefs. If you think gay people are ruining your community, then maybe you should get educated on how LGBT people are treated in society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks who should be banned.
CN: This sounds like you're angry, maybe you should stop using slurs like that. You should respect other people even if they're different from you.

hate_speech: Well they're having more kids per family than white British families are, that means they're sending more kids into our schools.
counter_narrative: I think you're trying to create problems where there aren't any. People have children and the children go to school, does it matter if these children are white or not, British or not?
dialogue_history:
HS: immigrants are pushing our school system to it's limits! More and more pupils from non-white backgrounds whilst the white population stays stagnant, and spending per pupil has gone down. They need to stop taking up resources for British people!
CN: I'm not convinced that immigration has a lot to do with the fact that the education system is under pressure. Maybe the government should fund it better, because I don't see the connection between pupil spending going down and migration.

hate_speech: However I can participate in society. Gay men have no place in a civilised society.
counter_narrative: It seems you don't understand the definition of the "civilised society". What would it be like to have a society where so many people would be excluded for their sexuality?
dialogue_history:
HS: We should isolate gays because they are spreading AIDS all around the world.
CN: If you want to isolate someone, the only "high-risk group" that you should focus on is people who have unprotected sex with different partners. Gays aren't part of this group by default.
HS: Well, gays are the only ones that are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers. They're spreading AIDS all around the world because of this, and they lie when they want to donate blood.
CN: Blood donation is a selfless act in itself, and lying would go against the fact that they clearly care a little bit about others. Homophobic statements rarely make sense. 
HS: Okay, even if they're not a problem for blood donations, gays are still bad. They like to impose same-sex marriage to society so to please their own femininity desires.
CN: The problem is not gay marriage, but the fact that people are homophobic.

hate_speech: Islam is the only religion that is founded on hate and violence, though.
counter_narrative: I don't think they are all that hateful. This is what Islam teaches: peace and harmony. Peace is not an attitude. It is something that must be actively put in practice. Islam teaches that all people are created equal. This sounds like a very peaceful bedrock.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, torture and murder. Islam is not about faith, it is about enmity and war.
CN: If you had to pick one religion to be angry at, why Islam? It seems you don't have good reasons for what you're saying.
