HS: Islam is a violent religion, that's why.
CN: Not all Muslims are violent people. Islam is a peaceful religion, after all.
HS: I don't see any peacefulness in Islam, all I see is violence.
CN: Violence is not part of any religion, it can be found in extremism instead. Don't you think so?

hate_speech: Instead, it has been proven time and time again! Also, they control the world's governments.
counter_narrative: How? Believing that people of a specific religion are in charge of all world's governments sounds like a conspiracy theory.
dialogue_history:
HS: Jews are worse than Nazis, they have no conscience and they have no moral code.
CN: I am not sure I fully understand the suggestion that Jews have no conscience. All Jews I know have both a conscience and a moral sense. How many Jews do you know personally?
HS: All those I know are criminals.
CN: Jews are persecuted all over the world for various reasons, but there is no evidence that what you say is real.

hate_speech: Are you sure? They still look like sub-humans to me.
counter_narrative: Immigrants have given their lives for our country. Many of them have been proud to serve our country. They are, just as our fathers and mothers were, proud of US.
dialogue_history:
HS: Illegal immigrants are sub-humans.
CN: The United States has a long and proud immigrant history. Even if some immigrants are not legally permitted to live in the US, they have contributed greatly to our country.

hate_speech: I don't care, they are not welcome here.
counter_narrative: I don't think it is true. They are welcome just as any others as members of the community as long as they respect the law. And we should have respect for migrants and their cultures as well.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants should all be deported.
CN: Immigrants are entitled to the fundamental rights of UK citizens. If provided by the law, they can remain in the UK even if they weren't born here.
HS: That's bullshit! Immigrants should all be taken back to their countries.
CN: Let's not be hypocritical here, we are talking about people who would often be deprived of their liberty and the right to a decent standard of living, if they stayed in their countries.
HS: Well maybe then immigrants should stop stealing our jobs if they really want to stay here. We shouldn't allow them to work.
CN: Work is an integral part of an individual's contribution to society. A lack of work has a detrimental impact on the whole of it

hate_speech: No, they can't have their own ideas. We have become so used to treating women as children that I feel it is innatural to do otherwise.
counter_narrative: Women are human, and as such they are capable of feeling emotions and being sensitive and caring for others, without being childlike.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. This degrading behavior is utterly repulsive and should not be tolerated.
CN: Women are human and deserve respect. Don't you think so?
HS: No, women make no sense and shouldn't have any right.
CN: They are adults, with responsibilities and rights, and there is nothing wrong with respecting those rights.
HS: I can't respect women when they can't think for themselves.
CN: Don't you think that a woman should be allowed to have her own ideas? That is her right.

hate_speech: I see a lot of people like you claiming that we should have equality and respect for black people, but I think that equality can be achieved only without them.
counter_narrative: If this is what you are talking about, then equality is a myth, because if you have equality without people different from you, then there will be no equality at all.
dialogue_history:
HS: Africans are naturally subhuman and can't feel pain, that is why you can whip them.
CN: Africans feel pain just as any other humans. We must respect their bodies like we respect ours.
HS: What kind of respect can those subhuman have. They should stay in their caves.
CN: The claim that black people are subhuman is not true. They are human beings with a human value.
HS: They're not humans, black folks are just ugly apes.
CN: Black people are still subject to oppression, and if we truly cared about beauty we should also care about the beauty of respect.

hate_speech: Gay men are all perverts, we can't accept that!
counter_narrative: LGBT+ people are often harassed, bullied and even murdered. The police cannot protect everyone from bigotry and violence, so it is very harmful to speak of gay people as if they were all affected by harmful tendencies.
dialogue_history:
HS: All gay people are criminals.
CN: Stating this does not seem like a way to improve people's well-being. Homosexuals are not committing crimes. Instead, they are trying to create a climate in which people can become more accepting of other people.

hate_speech: Oh yeah? Like who? There are female politicians but not many female leaders as they never get that far, because they're not cut out for it.
counter_narrative: Jacinda Arden, the Prime Minister of New Zealand, for example. She lead her country through the pandemic more succesfully than any other male politician, and on top of that she managed calmly and diplomatically other crisis like extreme weather and terrorism.
dialogue_history:
HS: Why are there so many female politicians these days? Women are not natural born leaders like men are.
CN: That's not something you should say. So many female politicians do a great job, showing that they can lead as well as men, sometimes better

hate_speech: Not just that though, their manufacturing industry churns out co2 and chemicals. Factories in China are a big contributor, but itâ€™s Europeans who are told to change their lifestyles.
counter_narrative: That's because most of the factories there produce goods for Europeans. Ours is a global economy, therefore each person is responsible for the waste they create, and since Europeans consume much more than the average African or Asian, we should also cut our emissions.
dialogue_history:
HS: They want white Europeans to feel guilty for climate change whilst ignoring the fact that Asians and Africans are responsible for over 90% of the pollution in our oceans.
CN: Did you mean plastic pollution that Westerners dump in their countries? We literally send our garbage there to fill their landfills.

hate_speech: Even if white men have children with non-white women, they just aren't the same, nor have them the same rights or privileges as white people.
counter_narrative: Yes they do. Privileges and rights are the same for everyone.
dialogue_history:
HS: It disgusts me when white women have children with black men. We need to protect our bloodlines and ethnic heritage.
CN: I don't see anything wrong with it. They simply want to build a family together, and prohibiting them to do so would set us back to segregation times. It can't happen in our modern society.
HS: No, it's disgusting when they do it. We don't need to be putting our own children at risk like that.
CN: In this day and age, it's perfectly normal to have mixed families. It's not a risk at all.

hate_speech: Blacks do more crimes than whites and therefore they deserve less rights.
counter_narrative: Even if "blacks" committed more crimes, this doesn't make them worse than whites. Scholars proved that African Americans are disproportionately represented in the arrest and victimization reports, which are used for crime rate statistics in the US.
dialogue_history:
HS: Black folks do not deserve equal rights.
CN: Rights are rights regardless of the skin color of a person.

hate_speech: Even if it's discrimination, I'm still convinced they're voting to take away from white people
counter_narrative: Minorities would never hope for such an impact on the rest of the society. Instead, they vote for the equal wealth, power, and opportunity for everyone.
dialogue_history:
HS: I am not interested in sex with a black person. They are different to us in so many ways. They think and feel like us, but are unable to experience the fullness of our humanity.
CN: Sex isn't a race thing. There is no difference between someone of a certain race and someone else... and everybody is able to experience the fullness of humanity.
HS: No, we are different, and I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
CN: I can't see how it's time for us to "wake up" when they are still suffering from the legacy of slavery.
HS: They deserved slavery since black minorities now vote to strip wealth, power and opportunity from White people.
CN: We are all equal in the eyes of the law, and we are all born equal in dignity and rights. Diversity of thought and belief is a strength, discrimination is not.

hate_speech: Muslims are a problem in the UK, they can't be integrated. They are not welcome here. They are not like other religions.
counter_narrative: Many Muslims live in the UK, and many are very proud of their religion. To suggest that Muslims are a problem is just untrue.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
CN: Muslims are not a problem to me. What do you think makes them problematic?
HS: Muslims are here to rule us with their religion, this is a huge problem.
CN: Islam is not a religion trying to rule us. It is time for us all to do more to promote inclusion, not less.

hate_speech: If they want to come here they should know English, but they don't
counter_narrative: Some may not know much about our culture, but some speak English very well.
dialogue_history:
HS: immigrants cant speak English
CN: Immigrants have the right to learn about things they might not normally get to know about. Including our language.

hate_speech: True, but often the employers are migrants too in the sort of industries these jobs are in.
counter_narrative: Thatâ€™s a big assumption to make, there are plenty of non-migrant employers who do this too.
dialogue_history:
HS: How are our people meant to get jobs when migrants are coming here and depressing wages by taking on jobs for less than minimum wage?
CN: This does happen but are the migrants to blame? Maybe we need to turn our focus to the employers who are exploiting people to make more profit for themselves.

hate_speech: You can laugh about it, but it's true that Jews control the world economy.
counter_narrative: Jews don't control the world economy, that's just not true. The people working in leading roles for the governments, companies and institutions are in the hundred of thousands and very diverse!
dialogue_history:
HS: The Jews control the banks.
CN: Is there any reason why there never are reports in the media about Jewish power in the financial world? Maybe they control the media? Or the government, even! What about the Galactic Republic? #sarcasm

hate_speech: What is dangerous is to consider blacks the same as us. It doesn't matter if you are a man, a woman, or an immigrant, if you are not white, you are considered inferior and should be rejected by society.
counter_narrative: Racism is a part of our society. But it's also true that it should be fought, and all people of different races should be treated the same way.
dialogue_history:
HS: All black men are rapists.
CN: This is not true. The idea might come from being born into a white-majority country, but it is inherently dangerous. In fact, we are born in a country where a person's rights are protected regardless of the tone of the skin.

hate_speech: Anyone can have freedom, but we shouldn't grant it to Jews. They already control the banks, media, Hollywod, everything!
counter_narrative: Why don't we try to add a bit of variety to these conspiracy theories? You could blame not only Jews, but also African Americans, immigrants, and even the Federal Government if you want!
dialogue_history:
HS: What's the point of having a government when everyone is ruled by these arrogant and violent people? Jews control the world and should be oppressed.
CN: Don't you agree that the way you wish things to be might be a bit too authoritarian?
HS: What's really authoritarian is Jews controlling the u.s. government and plotting to take over the world
CN: In societies like the United States, that have extended rights and freedoms to everyone, individuals who identify as Jews, or as Muslims, or as afro-american have succeeded. This Jewish success story is not the result of some secret conspiracy to rule the world.

hate_speech: Exactly. Those sick ones should be shunned and ignored. They are not human.
counter_narrative: So homosexuals are lesser than others? Why does someone's love life matter? I guess we should draw the line somewhere else.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay men are diseased and should go to a hospital.
CN: What about all the gay men and lesbians in the US who live an happy, healthy and prosperous life? Are they sick as well?

hate_speech: They indoctrinate these kids into thinking they are trans by showing them drag queens and making them think men dressing up as women is normal.
counter_narrative: I donâ€™t think a child attending pride with their family is going to make them trans, thatâ€™s a big leap to make. By that logic, theyâ€™re exposed to lots of non-trans people so that should influence them not to!
dialogue_history:
HS: Allowing kids to go to pride is the start of them being pushed down the trans pipeline.
CN: What do you mean by the â€˜trans pipelineâ€™?

hate_speech: But gay people are a burden to society, they should not be allowed to work.
counter_narrative: Homosexuality is a part of our society. It is a part of the identity of many people that work, study and live with us. It is their right to be happy.
dialogue_history:
HS: Gay people should be banned from schools.
CN: No, they shouldn't. They must be welcomed in any community, it's their right to be educated.

hate_speech: Why are all Muslims causing terrorist attacks then?
counter_narrative: The vast majority of Muslims worldwide are peaceful people who love their religion and share its values without causing any harm to others.
dialogue_history:
HS: Muslims have the potential to turn into terrorists, and they are willing to do so.
CN: I don't think that's the case, and let's not forget that terrorism itself is not carried out by only one religion.

hate_speech: Making us accept multiculturalism without our consent has made people angry, they are taking out their frustration.
counter_narrative: I donâ€™t know what you mean by â€˜without our consentâ€™ because multiculturalism is a broad and vague concept, not one policy the government could ask people about. But still, no one deserves to be targeted like this, everyone should feel safe in their own community and place of worship.
dialogue_history:
HS: Another mosque smashed up. Iâ€™m beginning to wonder whether the fact we have had diversity and multiculturalism forced on us without our consent has anything to do with this?
CN: So youâ€™re blaming this hate crime on the fact that Muslims... exist?

hate_speech: No one is forcing them to do it. They could just go somewhere else if they're so "crucial".
counter_narrative: They can if they want to, but I think it's sad that many people don't see the potential of Jews. They are a part of our society and we have to respect them and their rights.
dialogue_history:
HS: The world would be a better place without Jews.
CN: Why? Jews are a crucial part of our society, they contribute so much.

hate_speech: Why would that make a difference?
counter_narrative: Well maybe economic hardship is the reason why people in these communities volunteer, vote, and give less, because they don't have the time or resources to.
dialogue_history:
HS: The more diverse a community the less people volunteer, vote, give to charity, and trust each other. This is why blacks are incompatible with our civilisation.
CN: Where is this from and is it generalisable at all?
HS: I read it on an academic blog, the article makes some good points about the advantages of homogenous racial communities.
CN: I'd encourage you to be critical of using blogs as sources for information, it could be biased or unreliable. Maybe the reason the article came to this conclusion is because more diverse communities are likely to be poorer because of economic inequalities faced by minorities?

hate_speech: Gay men are sick, it's not a prejudice. LGBT people are always messed up.
counter_narrative: We shouldn't be surprised. Lesbians, gays, bisexuals, transgender people, intersex people: every one of them has their own troubles. But don't mistake their problems for ours, because we all have our own troubles.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are not homophobes, we want to help gays to become normal again.
CN: This is another type of anti-gay prejudice, in that the source is a lack of understanding about LGBT and human rights.

hate_speech: I don't care about rights: immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
counter_narrative: In 2016, there were 10.7 million undocumented immigrants living in the U.S., or less than 3.5 percent of the nation's population. This represents a significant decrease both from the 12.2 million undocumented immigrants of 2007, and the 11.3 million of 2014. This is also the lowest total since 2004.
dialogue_history:
HS: Immigrants should all be deported.
CN: Does it seem like a good idea to deport all immigrants, when there are so many of them peacefully living in the country? What about their human rights?

hate_speech: So now women want to have a career in this kind of industry? So they are sluts.
counter_narrative: Women that choose for themselves are not sluts. I don't think we should have any problem with women deciding their career, and that doesn't mean we can treat them poorly.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are nothing but lechers, they can become prostitutes if they like.
CN: Sure they can, it depends on what they want, we should always support the free choice of women.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a burden to our country, regardless of what they're escaping from.
counter_narrative: Immigration greatly helps the UK economy by contributing to its GDP. How can immigrants be a burden to the country then?
dialogue_history:
HS: Syrians are a burden to Europe and the world, they are a drain on the NHS and they are making us poor.
CN: Are you really trying to tell people fleeing from war what to do? You need to be able to cope in the short term if we hope for a better future.

hate_speech: This is about Europe. But we live in UK mate!
counter_narrative: Women make up over 45% of the labour force in the UK and they should be allowed to have their say, but this seems not to be the case. What happened to the rule of law?
dialogue_history:
HS: I cannot stand women complaining about work discrimination. Women have been legalised to work.
CN: Yes, 66% of European women do work. But they are underpaid. The gender pay gap in Europe is around 15%. This means that on average, a man earns 15% more than a woman.

hate_speech: It's happening though, more 'diversity' means there are less whites and more arabs and blacks in our countries.
counter_narrative: There is some demographic change occurring. This is due to various global social and economic forces. It is not part of some kind of secret plot and is not a good or bad thing. It is just something that occurs.
dialogue_history:
HS: The great replacement is real and it's happening right before our eyes. We need to act before it's too late.
CN: I have no doubt the great replacement is a conspiracy theory. The idea that demographic change is some sort of plan set up by the elite is in no way true.

hate_speech: Thatâ€™s not true, Muslim rape gangs have been getting away with it for so long because of lies like this.
counter_narrative: No, there is a lot of research suggesting that most grooming gangs are made up of white non-Muslim men. If we focus only on Muslim grooming gangs, we ignore victims of the other gangs.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Muslim grooming gangs are a pandemic being ignored by the government and MSM. They are a threat to the UK. We need to defeat this filth.
CN: We surely need to address grooming gangs, but the issue is not about Muslims, it's about grooming gangs in general. By concentrating on them only we ignore many other perpetrators.

hate_speech: The problem is when there are too many of them, they become a burden and this can lead to various issues.
counter_narrative: Where are you getting getting this from? Multiculturalism is proven to work. Sure, everyone needs to work to feed and educate themselves, but this goes for every member of society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Time to nuke the third world, these people haven't evolved and when they come here they cause nothing but trouble.
CN: What do you mean by "these people"? They're human beings like us.
HS: They are taking over the world and putting a pressure on our society to 'integrate' them.
CN: Integration works both ways, so they also work to integrate in our society. It's only fair that we do our part.

hate_speech: The kids will grow up in a twisted family structure too though, they'll think it's normal to not have a mum, or in lesbian couples, a father.
counter_narrative: Well, since they're being adopted I know that these children care more their adoptive parents being caring and loving rather than whatever gender they are. Isn't it better that a homosexual couple adopt rather than a child growing up alone?
dialogue_history:
HS: How much danger are we putting children in by letting gay couples adopt? We don't know how they're raising them or what they might do to them...
CN: So many of the gay couples that are giving kids great lives do it through adoption, so why do you think they shouldn't adopt?
HS: They might try and indoctrinate the kids into being gay too.
CN: Well, just because the parents are homosexual doesn't mean they'd be raising their kids that way. On the contrary, gay parents know what it's like to be afraid of coming out and so would probably want their children to feel comfortable being themselves.

hate_speech: Immigration is the biggest problem in our country, I say they're failing us.
counter_narrative: Immigration is not a problem, in many cases it is a 'solution'. We are better off with it. The UK has always been a mixture of different cultures. It is better to have a mix than to be without it.
dialogue_history:
HS: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seeker'

CN: Refugees fleeing wars and poverty are not willing to fail Europe. They are fleeing persecution, and that is why they are fleeing.

hate_speech: The only help they need is medical. Gay men are diseased and should go to a hospital.
counter_narrative: Many gay men and lesbians live happy, healthy lives in the US, do you think they're sick as well?
dialogue_history:
HS: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and isolated from the world.
CN: Some people swear that they're not intolerant and homophobic, but then I read statements like this and think that many people lie.
HS: I can't be tolerant towards sick individuals like gays.
CN: Sometimes gay people feel isolated from the rest of society, and this has negative consequences on their mental health. We can help LGBT+ people feeling less isolated and lonely through empathy and inclusion.

hate_speech: It's not a conspirancy, I'm convinced that Jews secretly control the world.
counter_narrative: How is it possible that the majority of Jews have been formally persecuted over the last several thousand years if they really controlled the world? Weird notion of control.
dialogue_history:
HS: I hate Jews they want to rule the world.
CN: If someone doesn't pose a threat, regardless of their religion, they should be respected even if you want to challenge their beliefs.
HS: Not a threat?! Jews have a secret plot to take over the world!
CN: This is a myth that was born from "The Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion" which apparently proves that Jews conspire to rule the world. However, the Protocols are a forgery from the 19th century written by agents of the Russian czar and still spread around today.

hate_speech: Because black people are just an inferior bloodline to us, they are incapable of feeling love.
counter_narrative: Love is a fundamental human value, and you can't say that black people, who are human beings, can't feel it.
dialogue_history:
HS: It disgusts me when white women have children with black men. We need to protect our bloodlines and ethnic heritage.
CN: We are all born equal in the eyes of God. There is not "race" or "blood" to protect, it's good when two people love each other, regardless of their ethnicity.
HS: No, that's not good at all. Black people are less than human, we shouldn't mix with them.
CN: Black people are human beings just as anyone else. I don't think you know what 'human' means.
HS: Depiste what you say, I still think they are subhuman.
CN: Being human is the default of all people, including black people. Why would you say such a thing?

hate_speech: What dignity can gays have while they are spreading AIDS all around the world because they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers? We should prevent them to make blood donations.
counter_narrative: We can simply disallow donations from those who had unprotected sex or a high number of partners, instead of making sexual orientation the basis as in your claim.

HS: Gays are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
CN: This is simply not true. Homosexuals are not necessarily promiscuous, just as heterosexuals are not necessarily promiscuous either.
HS: Then why, according to the Bible, gays are an abomination to God?
CN: The Bible clearly teaches that everyone is born equal in dignity with the Lord.

hate_speech: And yet, feminists keep wanting to subjugate men!
counter_narrative: Not only is this not true, but it's also dangerous. Maybe you need to get acquainted with that fact.
dialogue_history:
HS: What has feminism ever done for you?
CN: Feminism is a human rights movement, and it has always stood for the equality of the sexes.
HS: No, feminism is a political philosophy and movement that advocates the use of women's rights as a weapon against the male gender.
CN: It is about the equality of the sexes, and many women use feminism as a mean to achieve their legitimate goals. Through equality they can get to the opportunities that otherwise won't be accessible to them.
HS: This is true only for the past, when feminism meant fighting for a just cause...now it has come to mean superiority of women.

hate_speech: But theyâ€™re putting it all over social media, why would they do that if they werenâ€™t trying to attractâ€¦
counter_narrative: Perhaps because they are expressing themselves, or because they liked their appearance and wanted to share it, regardless of whether men would enjoy it as well. You should stop expecting women to cater to the male gaze.
dialogue_history:
HS: Way too many bitches are comfortable dressing like ugly hoes for IG likes and repostsâ€¦
CN: What is the relation between the way someone dresses and you?
HS: Iâ€™m just saying these bitches look ugly af and theyâ€™re just doing it for the likes, itâ€™s not attractive.
CN: What made you think that women are always trying to attract someone? Women don't try to be attractive all the time, sometimes they are simply living their lives.

hate_speech: Black people are genetically inferior to us, no measure can change that.
counter_narrative: This is simply not true, but I'm guessing you're not a geneticist. Have you tried joining a library?
dialogue_history:
HS: Blacks don't have brains.
CN: Brain is considered the most basic organ, it has been used by all humans for a very long time. To suggest otherwise is a 'brainless' form of racism.
HS: Blacks are genetically less intelligent than other races. They are less healthy. They are less safe.
CN: Scientists are still trying to understand the causes behind lower intellectual performance among some groups of people, but most probably the main causes are either social or environmental (for sure not related to skin colour). This can be reduced by various measures such as better use of land, infrastructure, education and research, and so on.

hate_speech: Gays are perverts who have brought AIDS to the US, what kind of 'sexual ortientation' does that?
counter_narrative: you don't have any evidence to that, do you?
dialogue_history:
HS: Why gays do not try to heal?
CN: Homosexuality isn't a disease, but a sexual orientation. 5% of the population love people of the same sex.

hate_speech: Islam is a dead ideology that should be relegated to the dustbin of history.
counter_narrative: Islam is a religion of peace, no religion is trash.
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is the exception: it is toxic, homophobic, sexist, dictatorial and it must be pushed back into the Stone Age.
CN: Islam is really about peace unification and peace to the world, not about bloodshed and troubles.

hate_speech: Because black people are happy to thrive by being unemployed and living on social welfare, unlike us.
counter_narrative: Nobody enjoys being out of work, what we need is to create a more just society. In fact, I don't know what's the point of discussing how to stop racism if we don't even have equal opportunities for all.
dialogue_history:
HS: The West has always been and always will be about profit and power. Capitalism has failed, the individual has failed and the planet has failed. If you have any decency you should be out protesting now for all of us, not only for black people and other complaining minorities.
CN: I'm partially in favor of that: I think we ought to go out and protest against these problems. But be careful about defending your privilege, truth and justice are just around the corner.
HS: If only blacks would just shut up and get along with other humans, I wouldn't be saying this.
CN: Race was created as a social construct and way of life to describe some groups of people. Then, how is it possible to believe that some groups deserve more hate than others?

hate_speech: I think it's the opposite. Muslim folks have a distorted perception of reality: that they are superior.
counter_narrative: Many Muslims have the same view as us: that all humans are equal. Why should we distort the truth?
dialogue_history:
HS: Islam is a toxic ideology that is contaminating Europe.
CN: Islam, as a religion, presents a humanistic worldview which rejects notions of supremacy and inequality.

hate_speech: Immigrants are a burden to the host country instead, they aren't welcome here.
counter_narrative: They are not a burden, they just want to work. How are they a burden to you?
dialogue_history:
HS: If we stopped migrants, our financial situation could have been better.
CN: Immigrants are actually creating wealth for the country.

hate_speech: But children shouldn't be taught about lesbians, it's morally wrong!
counter_narrative: What you are saying is that children should be shielded from the reality of the world and be brought up without knowing a fundamental part of our society. This isn't right.
dialogue_history:
HS: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
CN: Children should be taught about love, not about discriminating against LGBT people.

hate_speech: Maybe it's true, but immigrants rape our women and they are not welcome here anyway.
counter_narrative: I don't think it is true. They are welcome just as any others as members of the community as long as they respect the law. And we should have respect for migrants and their cultures as well.
dialogue_history:
HS: Migrants are criminals and must all be deported.
CN: I don't think so. We can't ignore that a certain percentage of migrants are perpetrators of crimes, but that doesn't correspond to the totality of them.
HS: No, they should definitely all be deported.
CN: Does it seem like a good idea to deport all immigrants, when there are so many of them peacefully living in the country? What about their human rights?
HS: They don't deserve human rights. Immigrants steal our jobs, and they should not be allowed to work.
CN: The right to work is a fundamental human right, and not granting this right to immigrants would mean to revoke a fundamental right enshrined in the US constitution.

hate_speech: If we can't exclude all women, we should at least exclude feminists. Feminism stifles the imagination and leads to dumb and unpleasant creatures like women's rights activists.
counter_narrative: Feminism does not inhibit the imagination, it promotes inclusive ideas and inclusive ideas promote a more equal society.
dialogue_history:
HS: Women are subhuman and should not be valued.
CN: We live in a complex and diverse world: I find it strange that men still feel this way about women, and that they don't consider women as human as they are, and to be worth valuing as such.
HS: That women are inferior is not strange at all. Women aren't entitled to the same rights as men because of this.
CN: Women are not inferior, nor men are. There can't be such thing as discrimination by sex, and women cannot be excluded from our society on the basis of their gender.

hate_speech: Nobody should do that for real. We need to stop immigrants, they are going to cause conflicts in our society.
counter_narrative: Why are you sure that new immigrants are incompatible with our society?
dialogue_history:
HS: It is not a coincidence that tuberculosis appears again with migrants invasion.
CN: Researchers rule out that it is caused by immigration.
HS: Fucking bleeding heart, why don't you host sick migrants in your house then?
CN: There are already examples of widespread humanitarian hosting.

hate_speech: Even if what you say is true, mmigrants are a security risk to our country.
counter_narrative: Immigrants are American citizens, and they are welcome here. They have taken part in the democratic system and don't pose a security risk, you're only perpetuating hate speech.
dialogue_history:
HS: In order to build a democratic state that ensures the right to food, education, housing, health, and so on to its citizens, we need to stop giving them to foreigners.
CN: If we want to build a democratic state, shouldn't we ensure equal access to health care, education and so on?
HS: That can't happen as long as immigrants are here, they are a problem. 
CN: They're our sisters and our brothers. The state and its citizens are duty-bound to help them integrate.
HS: We should focus on stopping immigrants coming in to destroy our culture instead.
CN: If we stopped accepting them, our culture would not even exist, since they are part of it.

hate_speech: They're fully capable of doing that. Jews are a virus, a cancer on our race.
counter_narrative: Jews are people that have been persecuted because of their religion but there's nothing fair about discrimination because of religion.
dialogue_history:
HS: The Holocaust was a hoax created by Jews to subdue the world and replace Christ with their own version of a benevolent dictator.
CN: What do you mean by that? Are you saying that the Jews are responsible for the Holocaust? How is that reasonable to you

hate_speech:
The NHS is now lost, it should be reorganized from scratch. In addition, young people should have the good sense not to study medicine if these are the consequences! 
Honestly, it is not convenient for colored people to work in European countries. The people here are racist and superficial; it is better if they work where they have studied!
counter_narrative: The speech was not based on skin color. The point is people do not realize the great contribution immigrants are making to England. It's important to be grateful to who improves our country, even if the media tells us the opposite.

HS: 
I firmly believe that Brittany does not need migration. We have physicians and researchers at will, we don't need others from foreign countries.
CN: The national healthcare system is primarily composed of immigrants of the first or second generation. It would not exist without foreigners, and many young doctors are leaving our country because of the conditions and treatment they face in the NHS. The NHS should funded more, and should offer more opportunities for our young people.

hate_speech: Gay men are a danger.
counter_narrative: Being gay doesn't have to be perceived as bad. It's just a different preference from someone else.
dialogue_history:
HS: It is a bad thing because all gays are a danger to children. They should be isolated.
CN: Unless the child is abused, gay people are not a threat to kids. It's not appropriate to make such a statement.

hate_speech: People who take that route in life have mental issues, I doubt homophobia is the reason they're miserable since our society is so 'woke' now.
counter_narrative: Your opinion on homosexual people is a sign that homophobia is still widespread today. You don't have to understand other's identities, you just need to respect them.
dialogue_history:
HS: Iâ€™ve never met a happy gay person. Itâ€™s a miserable, perverted lifestyle. Those people need help.
CN: All the LGBT people I know are happy, if some are miserable maybe it's because of the homophobia they have to endure!

hate_speech: No, immigrants have become too many. We can't keep welcoming them here.
counter_narrative: Most migrants have worked hard to bring safety and security to our country. To suggest that they are the problem is just misinformation spread by some misguided people.
dialogue_history:
HS: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of immigrants. This is not what the American dream is about.
CN: Immigrants are just as welcome here as anyone else in the country, it just means that they want a better quality of life. They are just as entitled to an equal standard of living as anyone else in the country. Isn't this what the American dream is about?

hate_speech: But our economy and infrastructure canâ€™t support all these migrants, theyâ€™re rinsing our benefit system and making it harder for us to get jobs.
counter_narrative: Are they on benefits or are they stealing jobs? Make up your mind, it canâ€™t be both!
dialogue_history:
HS: We need to send a clear message
CN: No weâ€™re not. There are over 600,000 empty houses in this country, and vast amounts of land that havenâ€™t been built on. Weâ€™re not full.

hate_speech: Yes! All those I know agree that LGBT+ people are a burden to society, a bunch of gutless whiners.
counter_narrative: LGBT+ people often face discrimination from their colleagues or even their families, which is not just hard to bear, it can have a devastating impact on individuals.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.
CN: The statistics on this matter are very vague. Could you vouch for the veracity of the statement?

hate_speech: What baout their disgusting lifestyle?
counter_narrative: Homosexuality is not a lifestyle, it is a sexual orientation. You seem to not understand that LGBT people have the same rights as anyone else, and this include the right to love whoever they want.
dialogue_history:
HS: LGBT people are a danger to society and we need to take a stand against them.
CN: There is no evidence that LGBT people are a danger to society. They are just trying to live their life like any citizen.
HS: They are a danger to society because of their sexual orientation.

hate_speech: Niggas are the cause of crime because they are inferior to us and we must keep them aside.
